direction.raw_text: I'd like to, if that's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SWITHIN'S - MOMENTS LATER Father Reilly watches as Blake sits with Mark - ten.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry. Mark nods slowly. Staring straight ahead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What was he doing in the tunnels?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lot of guys been going down the tunnels when they age out. Say you can live down there. Say there's work down there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of work are you gonna find in the sewers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More than you can find up here, I guess. Blake considers this. Troubled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina Kyle, in a little black dress, walks in with a drunk in a Hawaiian shirt. She sits him on a bar stool - walks over to a table where a neatly dressed man, Stryver, sits.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You brought a date?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like having someone around to open doors for me. Selina glances around. Things scattered throughout the bar. Jumpy. Selina hands an envelope to Stryver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right hand. No partials. Stryver slides a transparency out of the envelope. Holds it up to the light. Four perfect fingerprint transfers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very nice. He pockets the envelope.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not so fast, handsome. You got something for me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yes. Stryver signals a Thug who locks the door. Another Thug joins them at the table. Selina smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what you're going to do with Mr. Wayne's prints...but I'm guessing you'll need his thumb. As Stryver checks the envelope again -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't count so good, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I count fine. The Second Thug puts a gun to Selina's head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In fact, I'm counting to ten right now... Selina looks in his eyes. The Thug cocks his gun. She blinks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, okay - She reaches for her purse. The Thug stops her, reaches in himself - pulls out a cellphone. Slides it across the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My friend is waiting outside. Just hit 'send'... Stryver looks at the phone. Hits 'send'. Selina sizes up her options. A knock on the door. Second Thug hides his gun. The door opens - a young woman, Jen. She enters, cheerful, spots Selina. Pulls out an envelope, looks around.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Place is a little dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (takes envelope, tense) It'll liven up in a minute, trust me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Everything okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Great. Catch you later. Jen leaves. Stryver checks the envelope. Satisfied.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It would've been a lot easier to just give me what we agreed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can't have loose ends. And even in that dress, no one's going to miss you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. But my friend over there...? Stryver looks at Selina's 'date' drooling into a bowl of nuts at the bar - he looks familiar...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Every cop in the city's missing him. Across the bar, the TV on mute -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Stryver looks at Selina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cute. But they're not gonna be looking in a place like this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know... You did just use his cell phone. Stryver glances down at the cell phone as - SCREECH - the Thugs look out the window at cop cars and SWAT units descending on the bar. Stryver glances at the window and -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - Selina CRACKS his head against the table, grabs
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Second Thug's gun hand, flips over the table, firing at the other Thugs, who drop. The SWATs batter down the door. Selina crouches, cowering, screaming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's alright, Miss. Just stay down - The SWATs barrel past, chasing the remaining Thugs back through the bar and out into the back alley. Selina smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Thugs turn and open up on the SWATs with automatic weapons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina moves to the door. Spots the Congressman under the bar, clutching his bleeding leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep some pressure on that, sweetheart. She adjusts her dress in the broken mirror behind the bar. Moves for the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina waltzes out - right into Blake. She feigns panic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a man in there - he's bleeding!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's okay, Miss. It's okay. Blake helps Selina down onto the tailgate of a SWAT truck. He heads into the bar, weapon drawn. Selina slips behind the truck and into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake enters, gun drawn. Spots the Congressman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got the Congressman - bullet to the leg, but he's okay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The SWATs return fire. The Thugs lay down cover fire, then race around a corner into a smaller passage. A cop car pulls up, blocking the mouth of the alley - Gordon jumps out, gun drawn. The SWATs approach the passage, massing on both corners tactically. The two corner SWATs exchange hand signals, counting down... They round the corner, aiming low and high. The passage is empty. The SWATs cover a fire escape, but Gordon spots at once -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Manhole! He races to the manhole cover - SWATs wrench off the cover, Gordon grabs a flashlight from the nearest SWAT.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You three, down with me. You two, head down to cover the next exit -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where -?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get the DWP down here, now! Gordon starts climbing down the ladder...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon moves down the tunnel, flashlight low. Three SWATs fall in behind...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake comes into the alley. Cops surround the manhole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's the DWP guy?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They went down there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (shaking his head) And Gordon took SWAT in after them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon hears a noise up ahead - pushes forward, rounds the corner. BANG! GUNFIRE. SWATs return fire, shots sparking off the concrete walls, then - BOOM - behind him the tunnel
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: blasting the SWATs. Gordon races forward, tearing through the tunnels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake jumps back as a fireball bursts out of the manhole.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon races around a corner, gun drawn. A noise makes him turn - WHACK, he is clobbered from behind by a Thug.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake pushes forward.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, we gotta get down there -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was a gas explosion, kid -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gas? This is a sewer!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one goes in there till we know what's down there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We know what's down there, sir. The Police Commissioner!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Somebody get the hothead out of here. And get me a DWP guy! Blake backs off. Gets an idea - goes for his patrol car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thug 1 flips Gordon onto his back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This one's alive. (Looks closer.) Jesus. It's the Police Commissioner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What do we do?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take him to Bane. The two Thugs drag Gordon down through the maze of tunnels. As they descend deeper they encounter work crews of muscular men wielding large drills and jackhammers, working the walls and ceiling of the larger tunnels. Some of the men are armed Mercenaries, overseeing gangs of homeless street kids. They stare as Gordon is dragged past. The Thugs drag Gordon between two waterfalls, into -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They approach a figure, turned away, crouched in the firelight. Bare-chested, muscular, masked. Bane. A crooked line of scar tissue runs the length of his spine...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why are you here? The Thugs drop Gordon at Bane's feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Answer him! Bane slowly turns to the Thugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm asking you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's the Police Commissioner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you brought him down here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We didn't know what to do. We -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You panicked. And your weakness costs three lives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, he's alone - Bane flips the Thug's chin up and to the side with a crack. Thug 1 drops. Bane turns to Thug 2.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Search him. Then I will kill you. The Thug, terrified, pulls out Gordon's badge, wallet, gun...and the folded papers of the speech he did not read. Bane takes these one by one with quick glances. He stops at the papers. Unfolds them... As he reads, Gordon rolls off the steps, dropping into the rushing flow of water - gunshots ring out...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's dead. Thug 2 trails off as Bane looks up from the papers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then show me his body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That water runs to any one of the outflows - we'd never find him. Bane turns to the Lead Mercenary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me your GPS. Lead Mercenary hands him a GPS - Bane tucks it into Thug 2's jacket, zips it up like a mother sending her kid to school.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Follow him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Follow him? Bane shoots Thug 2, kicks him into the water. Turns to Lead Mercenary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Track him. Make sure both bodies will not be found. Then brick up the south tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake comes out to the catchment basin. He spots something stuck up against the grille, thrusts his hand into the raging waters - Gordon is there, alive. Just. Blake pulls him up onto the concrete, hoists him up, hurrying...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alfred opens the door to reveal Blake in his dirty uniform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need to see Bruce Wayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, Mr. Wayne doesn't take unscheduled calls. Even from police officers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if I go get a warrant, in the investigation of Harvey Dent's murder? Would that still count as unscheduled?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake is sitting, drumming his leg, nervous. Wayne enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What can I do for you, officer?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commissioner Gordon's been shot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry to hear that -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He chased a gunman down into the sewers. When I pulled him out he was babbling about an underground army. A masked man called 'Bane'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shouldn't you be telling this to your superior officers?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I did. One of them asked if he saw any giant alligators down there. He needs you. He needs the Batman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If Commissioner Gordon thinks I'm the Batman he must be in a bad way -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't know or care who you are. (Off look.) But we've met before. When I was a kid. At the orphanage. See, my mom died when I was small. Car accident, I don't really remember it. But a couple of years later my dad was shot over a gambling debt. I remember that just fine. (Looks at Wayne.) Not a lot of people who know what it feels like, do they? To be angry. In your bones. People understand, foster parents understand. For a while. Then they expect the angry kid to do what he knows he can never do. To move on. To forget. Wayne stares at Blake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So they stopped understanding and sent the angry kid to a boys' home - St. Swithin's. Used to be funded by the Wayne Foundation. See, I figured it out too late. You have to hide the anger. Practice smiling in the mirror. Like putting on a mask. You showed up one day in a cool car, pretty girl on your arm. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were so excited - Bruce Wayne, billionaire orphan. We made up stories about you. Legends. The other boys' stories were just that. But when I saw you I knew who you really were... (Beat.) I'd seen that look on your face. Same one I taught myself. Blake gets up to leave. Wayne is lost in thought.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know why you took the fall for Dent's murder, but I'm still a believer in the Batman. Even if you're not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did you say your boys' home used to be funded by the Wayne Foundation?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because the money stopped. Might be time to get some fresh air and start paying attention to the details. Some of those details might need your help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne and Alfred watch Blake drive away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You checked that name? 'Bane' -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ran it through some databases. He's a mercenary. No other known name. Never been seen or photographed without a mask. He and his men were behind a coup in West Africa that secured mining operations for our friend John Daggett.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now Daggett's brought them here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It would seem so. I'll keep digging.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Alfred turns to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why did the Wayne Foundation stop funding boys' homes in the city?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Foundation is funded from the profits of Wayne Enterprises... (Off look.) There have to be some.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Time to talk to Mr. Fox, I think.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll get him on the phone -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Do we still have any cars around the place?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One or two.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And I need an appointment at the hospital. About my leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which hospital, sir?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whichever one Jim Gordon's in. Alfred is less excited by this part of the request.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moving towards the tall skyscraper downtown.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Mr. Fox, I believe in what Mr. Wayne was trying to do...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miranda is talking to Lucius Fox at the table.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm only asking for explanations because I think I can help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll pass along your request. Next time I see him. Miranda catches something in this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He doesn't talk to you either?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's just say that Bruce Wayne has his...eccentricities.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Fox, are you aware that John Daggett is trying to acquire shares in Wayne Enterprises?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was not. But it wouldn't do him any good - Mr. Wayne still retains a clear majority. Miranda leaves. Fox moves into his office - stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bruce Wayne. As I live and breathe. Wayne rises, pushing hard on his cane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What brings you out of cryo-sleep Mr. Wayne?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I see you haven't lost your sense of humor...even if you have lost most of my money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, you did that yourself. See, if you funnel the entire R and D budget for five years into a fusion project that you then mothball, your company is unlikely to thrive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even with -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A wildly sophisticated CEO, yes. Wayne Enterprises is running out of time. And Daggett is moving in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What're my options?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're not willing to turn your machine on -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can't, Lucius.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then sit tight. Your majority keeps Daggett at arm's length while we figure out a future for the energy program with Miranda Tate - she's supported your project all the way. She's smart, and quite lovely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You too, Lucius?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We all just want what's best for you, Bruce. Show her the machine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll think it over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Anything else?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These conversations always used to end with some...unusual requests.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I retired.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me show you some stuff, anyway. Fox hits a button - the bookcase opens into a hidden elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox leads Wayne into the vast, gadget-filled space. They pass Tumblers with different weapons configurations...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I figured you'd have shut this place down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was always shut down, officially.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But all this new stuff?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After your father died, Wayne Enterprises set up fourteen different defense subsidiaries. I've spent years shuttering them and consolidating all the prototypes under one roof. My roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stop them falling into the wrong hands. Besides, I thought someone might get some use out of them... Wayne shakes his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sure I can't tempt you to something? Pneumatic crampons? Infrared lenses? Least let me get you something for that leg.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's fine the use it gets these days.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, then I have just the thing for an eccentric billionaire who doesn't like to walk... Fox opens a door - we glimpse a sleek vehicle. Wayne's eyes light up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now you're just showing off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Defense Department project for tight-geometry urban pacification. Rotors configured for maneuvering between buildings without recirculation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's it called?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It has a long and uninteresting Wayne Enterprises designation. So I took to calling it the Bat. And yes, Mr. Wayne, it does come in black. Wayne touches its sleek side. Marveling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Works great except for the autopilot.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's wrong with that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Software-based instability. Take a better mind than mine to fix it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Better mind?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was trying to be modest. A less busy mind. Yours, perhaps. Wayne looks wistfully at the machine. Turns away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you. I retired, Lucius.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne listens, distracted, while a Doctor examines an X-ray.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've seen worse cartilage in knees
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's good -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, that's because there is no cartilage in your knee. And not much of any use in your elbows and shoulders. Between that and the scar tissue on your kidneys, residual concussive damage to your brain tissue and general scarred-over quality of your body... (Takes a deep breath.) I cannot recommend that you go heli-skiing. About the only part of your body that looks healthy is your liver, so if you're bored I recommend you take up drinking, Mr. Wayne. Wayne smiles. The Doctor leaves. Wayne pulls on a ski mask, steps to the window, hops up, pulls a wire from his cane, which he clips to his belt. He props his cane behind the frame - jumps out. The wire unspools from the cane as -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne drops three floors...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon lies in his bed, hooked up to machines. Wayne, in ski mask, stands over him. Gordon's eyes flutter open. He tries to speak with a weak, hoarse voice...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We were in this together. Then you were gone...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Batman wasn't needed anymore. We won.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Built on a lie. Our lie. Now there's evil rising from where we tried to bury it. Nobody will listen... The Batman has to come back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if he doesn't exist anymore?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He must. He must.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne pulls up in front of a row of shabby subdivided town houses. Checks a tracking device. Jon, provocatively dressed, leads a Yuppie Banker-type in through a front door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina sits in a small room getting ready to go out. She picks up the pearls - hears a disturbance in the hall.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I told you - money first -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Goddammit, you took my wallet!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Yuppie has Jen against the wall - he reaches back to hit her with an expensive wristwatch-clad arm. But Selina has grabbed his wrist with a powerful grip.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She took my wallet! Selina twists his arm behind him in a blinding move.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now. She releases the Yuppie, who moves off down the stairs. Selina turns to Jen. Who is examining a wallet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you not to try it with the assholes, Jen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're all assholes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, the assholes who hit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know what he's so upset about, he only had sixty bucks in here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Probably the watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Watch? Selina opens her hand and gives Jen the Yuppie's Rolex.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina exits and hails a cab. Wayne watches her go. Then pulls out. Checking his tracker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Town cars dispense Gotham society in tasteful masquerade. Wayne pulls up to the Valet. Paparazzi line the entrance. Wayne uses his cane to get out of his Lamborghini...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Another stiff too old to climb out of his sports car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, that's Bruce Wayne! Hey, Wayne, where you been hiding? Lenses swing onto Wayne, who pushes a button on his key fob - a pulse. The cameras die. Wayne heads to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure if my assistant put me on the guest list -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right through here, Mr. Wayne...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lavish ball - the expressively attired dance under falling confetti... Even Bruce Wayne is struck by the ostentation. He spots Selina dancing with a deeply smitten Rich Twit. She wears a small, velvet pair of cat ears. And the pearls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S) Bruce Wayne at a charity ball? Wayne turns to find Miranda Tate, amazed, a small mask her only concession to fancy dress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miss Tate, isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even before you became a recluse, you never came to these things...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: True. Proceeds go to the big fat spread, not the cause. It's not about charity, it's about feeding the ego of whichever society hag laid it on.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, this is my party, Mr. Wayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And the proceeds will go where they should, because I paid for the big fat spread myself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's very generous of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have to invest to restore balance to the world. Take our clean-energy project...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sometimes the investment doesn't pay off. Sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have a practiced apathy, Mr. Wayne. But a man who doesn't care about the world doesn't spend half his fortune on a plan to save it... (Gentle.) And isn't so wounded when it fails that he goes into hiding... Wayne looks at Miranda. Intrigued.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Have a good evening, Mr. Wayne. Wayne watches Miranda glide away. Then turns to Selina.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mind if I cut in? Rich Twit turns, annoyed - Wayne hands him his cane. Takes Selina by the waist. She glares at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't seem very happy to see me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were supposed to be a shut-in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Felt like some fresh air.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why didn't you call the police?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I have a powerful friend who deals with this kind of thing. (Admires her cat ears.) Brazen costume for a cat burglar.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah? Who are you pretending to be?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bruce Wayne, eccentric billionaire. Who's your date?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: His wife's in Ibiza. She left her diamonds behind, though. Worried they'd get stolen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's pronounced 'Ibeetha'. You wouldn't want these folks realizing you're a crook not a social climber.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (flash of anger) You think I care what anyone in this room thinks about me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I doubt you care what anyone in this room thinks about you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't condescend, Mr. Wayne. You don't know a thing about me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Selina Kyle, I know you came here from your walk-up in Old Town - modest place for a master jewel thief. Which means either you're saving for your retirement - or you're in deep with the wrong people.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't get to judge me because you were born in the master bedroom of Wayne Manor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, I was born in the Regency Room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I started off doing what I had to. Once you've done what you had to they'll never let you do what you want to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Start fresh.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's no fresh start in today's world. Any twelve-year-old with a cell phone could find out what you did. Everything we do is collated and quantified. Everything sticks. We are the sum of our mistakes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or our achievements.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The mistakes stick better. Trust me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think that justifies stealing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I take what I need to from those who have more than enough. I don't stand on the shoulders of people with less.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Robin Hood?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd do more to help someone than most of the people in this room. Than you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you're assuming too much.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Or maybe you're being unrealistic about what's really in your pants other than your wallet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ouch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think all this can last? Wayne glances around at the sumptuous party.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a storm coming, Mr. Wayne. You and your friends better batten down the hatches, because when it hits you're all gonna wonder how you ever thought you could live so large and leave so little to the rest of us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sounds like you're looking forward to it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm adaptable.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These pearls do look better on you then they did in my safe... Wayne rolls her into his shoulder - reaches up to the back of her neck, unclasps the necklace. But I still can't let you keep them. The pearls slide off her neck into his other hand. Selina looks at him. Angry. Then kisses him, hard, and disappears into the crowd. Wayne's cane reappears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You scared her off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not likely.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne approaches the Valet. Pats down his pockets.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I must have lost my ticket -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your wife said you were taking a cab home, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My wife?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina permits herself a little smile as she guns the engine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alfred watches in the mirror as Wayne climbs into the back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just you, sir? Wayne gives him a withering glare. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't worry, Master Wayne. Takes a little time to get back into the swing of things. Wayne dials his phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) This is Fox.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remember those 'unusual requests' I used to make?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I knew it! Up front, Alfred listens. Concerned.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne pushes a button on a hi-tech carbon fiber brace strapped to his good knee - the brace tones. As Wayne starts moving his knee, bending, stretching, Alfred puts down a Thermos.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got the wrong leg, sir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You start with the good limb so it learns your optimum muscle patterns. Wayne swaps the brace to his bad knee. Puts his weight on it - the knee bends, kicks. He sits again. Cautious. Now we tighten it up. Wayne gingerly pushes a button - the brace starts to shrink tight to his leg, digging in. Wayne grits his teeth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It is terribly painful?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome to try it, Alfred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Happy watching, thank you, sir. Wayne shouts as the brace clicks home. He gets to his feet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not bad - Wayne executes a perfect roundhouse, knocking out a brick. Not bad at all. Alfred picks up the brick. Considers it. Uneasy. He follows Wayne across the bridge to the cube.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Master Wayne, if you're considering going back out there you need to hear some rumors surrounding Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm all ears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is a prison. In a more ancient part of the world. A pit. Where men are thrown to suffer and die. But sometimes, a man rises from the darkness. Sometimes...the pit sends something back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Born and raised in a hell on earth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Born in a prison?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one knows why. Or how he escaped. But they know who trained him one he did...R 's al Gh l. Your A U mentor. Wayne takes this in. Shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He plucked Bane from a dark corner of the earth and trained him in the blackest disciplines of combat, deception and endurance. Just like you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane was a member of the League of Shadows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Until he was excommunicated. And a man considered too extreme for R 's A al Gh l is not to be trifled with.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't realize I was known for trifling with criminals.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was then. And you can strap up your leg and put the mask back on. But it won't make you what you were.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which was?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone whose anger at death made him value all life. Even his own.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If this man is all the things you say he is, then this city needs me. The Batsuit emerges from the cube.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, this city needs Bruce Wayne. Your resources, your knowledge...not your body. Not your life. That time has passed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I tried helping as Bruce Wayne, Alfred. And I failed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can fail as Bruce Wayne. As Batman, you can't afford to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's what you're afraid of - that if I go back out there I'll fail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I'm afraid that you want to. Wayne looks at Alfred. Then turns to examine the Batsuit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A frenzy of trading on the packed floor... Two Traders sit on a shoeshine stand in the lobby.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You can't short the stock because Bruce Wayne goes to a party -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne coming back is change. Change is either good or bad.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On what basis?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I flipped a coin. Near the front entrance: a Food Delivery Guy is standing there negotiating with a Trader.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. Rye. I told 'em rye. Trader 3 spots bad news on a screen. Alright, I'll take it. He thrusts Food Guy a tip and grabs the bag, distracted... At the rear secure entrance: a Motorcycle Courier enters, wearing his helmet - a Female Security Guard gets in his face.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rookie! Lose the helmet! (Points at a camera.) We need faces for cameras. In the rest room: a Janitor mops the floor, shifting out of the way of two Traders who rush in to pee. At the shoeshine stand, Trader 1 waves a bill down at the man shining his shoes without a glance. Shoeshine Man takes the bill, then, as the Traders step off, he reaches into a gym bag and checks an automatic weapon. He clicks the slide home, then hoists the gym bag and heads for the trading floor. At the secure entrance: the Courier pulls off his helmet. The Female Security Guard's eyes go wide.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . In the rest room: the Janitor reaches into his bucket and pulls out a machine pistol in a Ziploc bag. Near the front entrance: Food Guy pulls an automatic pistol - clubs Trader 3 with it, pastrami flying. Shoeshine Man moves onto the floor, pulls out his weapon. Under the Courier's helmet - a mask. Bane. He grabs the Female Security Guard and throws her into her colleagues, lashing out in four directions with rapidfire lethality. Shoeshine Man fires into the large trading screens. The floor erupts into a different frenzy - traders hit the deck, screaming. Bane moves onto the floor...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a stock exchange, there's no money you can steal - He dries up as Bane stops. Turns to him...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why else would you people be here? Bane grabs Trader 1 by the throat and drags him across the floor to an online automated trades terminal... He puts the man's thumb onto the print reader - the screen lights up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Enter your password. Or I send these men to your home. Trader 1, terrified, types in his password. Outside, sirens. Shoeshine man pulls out a USB drive with an antenna - plugs it into the computer - figures race across the screen...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Police vehicles screech into the narrow street - construction vehicles are blocking. Blake argues with a burly Construction Worker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Move it, now! We've got a situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where can I move it?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That way! Blake points - but SWAT vehicles pile in, blocking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get in your vehicle and stay there! Foley and the SWAT Commander, Allen, approach the entrance. The Market Security Chief walks up, frantic.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've gotta get in there!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is a hostage situation -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a robbery! They've got direct access to the online trading desk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not risking my men for your
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's not our money, it's everyone's!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really? Mine's in my mattress.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you don't shut these guys down, the stuffing in that mattress might be worth a whole lot less, pal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cut the fiber line - shut down the cell tower. That'll slow them down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoeshine Man looks up from the laptop.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They cut the fiber. Cell's working.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For now. How much longer does the program need?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Eight minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Time to go mobile. Shoeshine Man picks up the laptop, slips it into his pack...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Allen shouts at his men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get the barriers up - no more in and out on this street! Steel wedge-shaped barriers rise up at the mouth of the street. A Sniper watches the doors through a thermal scope. Six large heat signatures bloom, too big for people...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've got something - The door explodes. SWATs duck, six sportbikes race out and leap the ramp-like barricades, sending SWATs scattering. Cops scramble to pull their vehicles out to give chase.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bikes weave through traffic, Traders strapped to the back, facing backwards - screaming, ties flying in the wind. A cruiser falls in behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoot the tires! A Veteran Cop sights a shot, but the Traders are in the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No shot!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley is barking into his radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Back off, back off! They've got hostages!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The cruiser follows the bike into a large tunnel. A Rookie Cop looks up into his rear-view.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's going on with the lights? The Veteran Cop looks back - streetlights and headlights are dying one after another. The darkness is chasing them - the darkness hits them. Their lights, sirens, and engine die... And, out of the silence, a dark shape roars past -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It can't be...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The hell was that?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh boy. You're in for a show tonight, son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Food Guy drives the rear bike. He looks back - sees streetlights explode behind him - darkness catching him up. The engine chokes and dies. The Trader jumps off, shouting for the cops. Food Guy turns, pulling his gun. SMASH! - Food Guy is thrown backwards off his bike by a dark wing as
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: races by on the Bat-Pod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley rushes to Blake's cruiser.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's roll, they've spotted the Batman!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The remaining bikes split up as they reach a high overpass.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Batman pulls up, overlooking the intersection - pulls a rifle-shaped device. A tone builds - he aims it at the bike and fires.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Janitor's bike sparks and dies. Sirens as Cops move in, Another bike splutters and dies - the Hostage breaks for cover.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Batman sees the last two bikes disappear beneath an overpass. He holsters his EMP rifle and guns the Bat-Pod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley, in the back, is using the cruiser as a mobile command station.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call everyone in - every car patrol, beat cop, off-duty, too! Pull 'em in, close every street! Now! Foley looks out at Gotham rushing by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna do what Gordon never could.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna take down the Batman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, what about the armed robbers? Foley ignores him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All around the city, cops mobilize - cars, vans, choppers...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane pulls up at speed alongside Shoeshine Man. Shoeshine Man glances inside his pack - signals '2'. Bane turns, sees darkness approaching, reaches back and grabs his Hostage, lifting him onto the back of Shoeshine Man's bike. Bane peels off - Batman stays on Shoeshine Man.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Spotter watches Bane peel off, hits the radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One bike's pulled off, no hostage -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley listens to the radio, hungry -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Should we pursue?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Negative! Stay on the Batman!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But he's getting away!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who do you want to catch? Some robber, or the son-of-a-bitch who killed Harvey Dent?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Coverage of the pursuit blares from all the TVs, as Daggett and Stryver watch. Tense.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People aren't saying much - frankly, they're too busy - but all signs suggest that what we're (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (cont'd) seeing is, in fact, the return of the Batman...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moving in on a shadow, crouched in front of Daggett's safe, working the dial... The shadow slides up a pair of goggles onto the top of its head creating the silhouette of cat ears. It is Catwoman. She turns to the TV, watching the pursuit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, what do you know? Catwoman opens the safe. Nothing inside. She frowns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane slips between two cruisers who tear after the Batman. He jumps up onto a concrete barrier, then down to the mouth of an outflow pipe. He glances at the entire Gotham Police Department descending on one man. Disappears into the pipe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shoeshine Man glances into his pack - the program beeps, finished. He looks back to see the Bat-Pod racing at him, ducks as it comes alongside...riderless. Shoeshine Man looks up, confused. WHUMP! His hostage is ripped off the bike by a low-flying dark shape. Shoeshine Man lays down the bike in a shower of sparks, rolls off dazed. Batman grabs him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ?! Shoeshine Man stares. Unafraid. Batman rips the computer from his pack. The screen reads:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blinding light and noise as police choppers descend - sirens everywhere. Batman grabs the USB drive from the laptop. He jumps on the Bat-Pod - pauses, taking in the sight of thousands of police, cars, choppers, dogs, closing in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: STEP AWAY FROM THE BIKE! Batman looks at the line of stopped traffic. An empty car transporter is below the on-ramp... Batman fires the cannons at the transporter, the near ramp crashes down, and Batman roars towards it - mounts it and jumps onto the on-ramp...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daggett angrily grabs some ice cubes for his drink.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: After eight years he has to pick tonight...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's drawing the cops off Bane... Daggett watches, intrigued.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley shouts down the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How did you let him go?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's got a lot of firepower -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you don't?! We're not letting one nut with a bad attitude and some fancy gadgets run this town down, you hear me?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's heading back downtown...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then he's as dumb as he dresses - close it down, gentlemen!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thousands of police jockey to pursue the Batman as he races back into the downtown area.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Bat-Pod tears along, pursued by a phalanx of cruisers, choppers overhead. More cops appear at the far end of the boulevard. The Bat-Pod executes a ninety-degree turn, flipping over as it goes, then guns into the darkness of a large blind alley. Cruisers and choppers block the mouth of the alley. Blake arrives last, his cruiser sealing the bottleneck. Foley swaggers out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Like a rat in a trap, gentlemen... Foley reaches for a loudhailer. VARRROOOOM!! A noise from the alley that none of the cops have heard before...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You might have the wrong animal there, sir - Spotlights smash on and a massive dark cyclone roars out of the alley, spinning the choppers sideways, dual rotor downdraft forcing all the cops to the ground. The Bat, now black, thunders up and over the entire Gotham
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Blake slides up to Foley. Dry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Are you sure that was him? Foley looks at Blake. Thrusts the loudhailer at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon, still hooked up to machines, watches TV. He smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Police are keeping quiet about the prospect of a return by the Batman, but eyewitness accounts seem the clearly suggests the type of...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daggett watches the TV coverage, concerned. Stryver enters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane says the Batman interfered, but the task was accomplished.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the men they arrested?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He says, and I quote, they would die before talking.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where does he find these guys? Daggett gets to his feet, relieved, moves to his inner office. Open the champagne...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daggett comes through the door, calling back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And can we get some girls in here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Careful what you wish for. Catwoman grabs him, throws him across the room. His back slams against the wall - he draws a gun, but - WHACK! - Catwoman pins his wrist to the wall at shoulder height using the high heel of her boot. He whimpers as she leans in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Cat got your tongue? She plucks the gun from his trembling hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You dumb bitch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nobody ever accused me of being dumb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dumb to show up here tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want what you owe me - Click - Stryver has a gun to her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: want' never gets... Stryver looks appreciatively at Catwoman as she lowers her leg...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nice outfit...those heels make it tough to walk? Catwoman digs her stiletto into his calf, hard. He screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, do they? Catwoman spins, disarms Stryver, grabs Daggett.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So where is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The program. The 'Clean Slate'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, yeah - the ultimate tool for a master thief with a record. I don't have it. The Bodyguard bursts in, gun drawn. Catwoman, holding Daggett, spins, kicking the window with the point of her heel. The glass shatters. She pulls Daggett through the window. He screams - they drop...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...ten feet onto the window-cleaning platform. Catwoman uses her bladed heel to cut a rope - the platform plunges down the side of the building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Catwoman dumps Daggett onto the roof, towering over him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where is it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The 'Clean Slate'? Type in a name and date of birth and within a couple hours that person ceases to exist in any database? Little too good to be true.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're lying. Rykin Data took it to prototype stage -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's why I bought them. But they had nothing. It was a gangland myth. Catwoman leans back from Daggett, taking this in... Shapes drop onto the rooftop. Emerge from fire exits. They're not Daggett's bodyguards, these are Bane's men... Catwoman holds Daggett by the throat, threatening him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay back! They continue to approach. One of them screws a silencer onto his gun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not bluffing!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) They know... All eyes search for the source of the voice. Catwoman spots it - a dark shape, crouched on the roof above: Batman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They just don't care. As the Mercenary with the silencer looks up, Catwoman leaps forward, grabs his gun. Batman drops into the middle of the fray, fighting back Mercenaries at Catwoman's back - she fires at one, clipping him, he drops. She spins aiming at another's head - Batman yanks her arm down, forcing her to miss the Mercenary. Batman takes him out with a kick.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've got to be kidding.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No guns. No killing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's the fun in that? As more mercenaries come out onto the roof, Batman runs for the far edge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on! Catwoman follows, confused, as Batman leaps off the roof. She gets to the edge, pauses to look down into the alley - sees the black angular roof of the Bat, cockpit open. Shots impact around her - she leaps, landing hard, but gracefully on the back of the vehicle, slides into the cockpit. As the engines thunder into life, and the canopy hisses shut, taking bullets from above.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mother warned me about getting into cars with strange men -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This isn't a car. Catwoman flinches as the Bat thunders into the sky, downdraft forcing the Mercenaries down onto the roof, all but one, who walks slowly across the roof, strong against the wind...Bane. He watches the Bat roar off into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Bat lands - the canopy opens. Catwoman jumps out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: See you around - Batman steps down after her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're welcome.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had it under control.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Those weren't street thugs - they were trained killers. I saved your life. In return I need to know what you did with Bruce Wayne's fingerprints. Catwoman looks at him. Considering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne wasn't kidding about a 'powerful friend'. I sold his prints to Daggett. For something that doesn't even exist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I doubt many people get the better of you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey, when a girl's desperate...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were they going to do with them?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know. But Daggett seemed pretty interested in that mess at the stock market. Batman considers this. A police chopper sweeps past, searching. Batman turns to it. Then turns back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miss Kyle -? But she is gone. So that's what that feels like.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alfred is studying security camera footage of Bane killing at the stock exchange. A roar builds - the waterfall glows brighter until...SMASH! The Bat breaches, downdraft spraying water. Two cubes rise - the Bat lands, Batman jumps out. Alfred brushes water off his suit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very inconspicuous. Shall I tell the neighbors you got yourself a new leaf-blower?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We bought all the neighbors. Alfred takes the cowl from him, then the cape, as they walk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From the look of the television coverage, you seem to have your taste for wanton destruction back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (pulls out USB drive) I retrieved this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shouldn't the police be gathering the evidence?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They don't have the tools to analyze it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They would if you gave them to them -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One man's tool is another man's weapon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In your mind, perhaps. But there aren't many things you couldn't turn into a weapon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alfred. Enough. The police weren't getting it done -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps they would've if you haven't made a sideshow of yourself.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Perhaps you're upset you were wrong.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wrong?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You thought I didn't have it in me. Alfred looks at him. Puts down the cape and cowl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't. You lead a bloated police force on a merry chase with some fancy new toys from Fox. What about when you come up against him. What then? Alfred points to the monitor - Wayne sees Bane killing...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll fight harder, I always have.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you had something to fight for. What are you fighting for now? Not your life. Wayne moves to switch off the monitor. Alfred grabs his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take a good look. At his speed, his ferocity, His training. I see the power of belief. Of the fanatic. I see the League of Shadows resurgent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You said he was excommunicated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By R 's al Gh l. Who leads them A U now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 's al Gh l was the League of
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shadows. And I beat him. Bane's just a mercenary, and we have to find out what he's up to. Wayne plugs the USB in, hits keys. Text scrolls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Trades of some kind. Coded... The screen blanks, a thumb print appears.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is that -?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mine. Courtesy of Selina Kyle. Wayne pulls out the USB, rises. Get this to Fox - he can crack the code and tell us what trades they were executing. Alfred looks at Wayne. Takes the USB.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Wayne hits the bottom of the stairs, Alfred calls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll get this to Fox. But no more. Wayne hears his tone of voice. Turns to him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've sewn you up and set your bones...but I won't bury you. I've buried enough members of the Wayne family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'd abandon me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see only one end to your story. Leaving is all I have to make you understand: you aren't Batman anymore - you have to find another way. You used to talk about finishing. About life beyond that awful cave -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Rachel died knowing we'd decided to be together. That was my life beyond this cave and I can't just move on. She didn't. She couldn't. Alfred considers this. Looks away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if he had? What if she wasn't intending to make a life with you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She was, I can't change that -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What if, before she died, she'd written a letter? Explaining that she'd chosen Harvey Dent over you? Wayne watches, confused, as the old man prepares to say -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And what if, to spare you pain...I'd burned that letter? Wayne stares at Alfred, shocked.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why would you say such a thing?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because I have to make you understand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're lying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because you are as precious to me as you were to your own mother and father and I swore to them that I would protect you and I haven't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're lying!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've never lied to you. Except when I burned Rachel's letter. Wayne turns on the old man, furious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How dare you use Rachel to stop me!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm using the truth, Master Wayne. Maybe it's time we all stopped trying to outsmart the truth and just let it have its day. I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry?! You expect to destroy my world, then shake hands?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I know what this means -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does it mean, Alfred?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It means your hatred. It means losing the person I've cared for ever since I heard his first cries echo through this house. But it might also mean saving your life. And that is more important. Wayne looks at Alfred. Furious. Summons the worst thing to say and says it quietly and calmly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye, Alfred.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye, Bruce. Wayne mounts the stairs...Alfred watches him go. Turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne is woken by the doorbell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Wayne moves through the empty house, tying his dressing gown, he can't resist one tentative.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alfred? But Alfred is gone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne opens the front door the find Fox. Fox is surprised.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Answering your own door?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. Could you decode the trades on that drive? Fox hands Wayne a newspaper - the main headline:
direction.name: direction

result.heading: BATMAN BACK TO FOIL OR MASTERMIND STOCK RAID

direction.raw_text: I didn't need to. Page three. Wayne turns the page:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: - AND LOSES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It seems you made a series of large put options on the futures exchange. Verified by thumb print. The options expired at midnight last night. Wayne looks up from the newspaper, reeling.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Long term we may be able to prove fraud, but for now...you're completely broke. And Wayne Enterprises is about to fall into the hands of John Daggett.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The weapons - we can't let Daggett get his hands on Applied Sciences -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Applied Sciences is shut up tight, and off the books. The energy project is a different story.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miranda Tate. We need to convince the board to get behind her. Let's show her the reactor -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're meeting her there in thirty-five minutes. You better get dressed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A scrapyard on the Gotham river. Across the water, the towers of Gotham. Lucius leads Miranda from her car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You brought me out here to show me a rubbish dump, Mr. Fox?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bear with me, Miss Tate. They arrive at a Portakabin and enter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miranda looks around the derelict office. Fox smiles at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep your hands and feet inside the car at all times. He hits a button and the floor descends, Miranda is shocked as the office becomes an elevator into -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They descend diagonally into a massive concrete tunnel...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is it, isn't it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The reactor is beneath the river so that it could be instantly flooded in an event of a security breach.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is Bruce Wayne really that paranoid?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm gonna plead the fifth on that one. Miranda marvels as they step off the elevator. She spots a figure deep within: Bruce Wayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I thought you might like to see what your investment built.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No radiation, no fossil fuels. Free, clean energy for an entire city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If it worked. It doesn't. Wayne leads Miranda to the core. Two perpendicular rings of electromagnets suspend a bowling-ball-sized mass of metal. Wayne hits buttons - the ball glows, then dies to cold.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ignition, yes. But no chain reaction.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've built a lot of security around a damp squib. Nothing. About three years ago a Russian scientist published a paper on weaponized fusion reactions. One week later your reactor started developing problems... (Looks at Wayne.) I think this machine works.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miranda, if it were operational, the danger to Gotham would be too great.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would it make you feel better to know that the Russian scientist died in a plane crash six months ago?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someone else will work out what Dr. Pavel did. Someone else will figure out how to turn this power source into a nuclear weapon. I need you to take control of Wayne Enterprises and this reactor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And to do what with it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Nothing. Until we can find a way to guarantee its safety.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And if we can't?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Decommission it. Flood it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Destroy the world's best chance for a sustainable future?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If the world's not ready. Yes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bruce, if you want to save the world you have to start trusting it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm trusting you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Doesn't count. You have no choice.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I could've flooded this chamber any time in the last three years. I'm choosing to trust you, Miranda, and that's not the easiest thing for me. Please. His eyes are genuine. Pleading. Miranda nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have a board meeting to get to.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Board Members, including Daggett and Miranda, take their seats. Fox at one end of the table, Wayne at the other.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'd like to point out that we have a non-board member here. Highly irregular, even if it is his family name above the door... All eyes go to Wayne. An older member of the board pipes up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bruce Wayne's family built this
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And he himself has run it -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Into the ground, sir. Anybody disagree? Check the value of your shares this morning. Gambling on crazy futures didn't just lose Mr. Wayne his seat, it's lost us all a lot of money. He needs to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm afraid he has a point, Mr. Wayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I understand. Ladies and gentlemen. Wayne glances at Miranda who nods at him. Wayne leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's get down to business.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne exits the building. There is an angry mob of Shareholders and a pack of hungry Reporters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne, how's it feel to be one of the people?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry, sir, they had paperwork - Wayne looks over to see his Lamborghini being towed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Looks like you need a lift. Wayne turns to see Blake standing by his patrol car. Nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Daggett bursts in, furious. Stryver tries to placate him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How the hell did Miranda Tate get the inside track on the Wayne board?! Was she meeting with Wayne? Was she sleeping with Wayne?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not that we know of -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Clearly you don't 'know of' anything, do you?! Where's Bane?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We told him it was urgent -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then where is the masked -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Speak of the devil... Daggett turns. Bane is already there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...and he shall appear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What the hell's going on?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The plan is proceeding as expected.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You see me running Wayne Enterprises?! (Moves towards Bane.) Your stock exchange hit didn't work, friend. And now you've got my construction crews working all hours around the city? How's that supposed to help my company absorb Wayne's?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Leave us.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You stay right there! I'm in charge! Bane places a gentle hand on Daggett's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you feel in charge? Daggett is taken aback. Stryver leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've paid you a small fortune -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And that gives you power over me? Daggett considers the heavy hand on his shoulder. Nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What is this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your money and infrastructure have been important. Till now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What are you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gotham's reckoning. Come to end the borrowed time you've all been living on... Bane gently takes the terrified Daggett's head in his hands...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are true evil...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am necessary evil. Stryver, on the steps outside the living room, flinches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne stares out the window. Blake glances across.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When you began...why the mask?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To protect the people closest to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a loner with no family.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There are always people you care about. You just don't realize how much until they're gone. (Collects himself.) The idea was to be a symbol. Batman could be anybody, that was the point.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was damn good to see him back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not everybody agrees.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They'll figure it out in the end.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got anything on Bane's whereabouts?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, I've got five hundred pages of tunnel records and a flashlight. I could use some help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You know what? Drop me in Old Town...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake drops Wayne off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't wait. I'll get a cab.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You got money?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (smiles, sheepish) Actually, no. Blake hands him some bills, watches him cross the street. The radio squawks. Blake reacts - drives off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina is packing a bag. She hears voices in the stairwell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I told you, money first.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) I don't think so.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina finds Wayne standing there with Jen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's not a mark. Jen looks at Selina. At Wayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And he doesn't have a cent to his name, anyway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne looks at the cramped space. Selina shifts, embarrassed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, it's not much. (Smiles.) But it's more that you've got right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Actually, they're letting me keep the house.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The rich don't even go broke same as the rest of us, huh?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (spots her bag) Vacation?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's just say that I've incurred the wrath of some people less susceptible to my charms than you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My powerful friend hopes to change your mind about leaving.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And how would he do that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: By giving you what you want.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It doesn't exist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He says it does. He wants to meet. Tonight.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He needs to find Bane. He thinks you'd know how.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell him I'll think about it. Wayne nods, starts to leave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mr. Wayne? I'm sorry they took all your money.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, you're not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake moves through the hospital corridor, looking for - 79.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake enters. Gordon is sitting up in bed, talking to Foley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can we help you, officer?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: John Daggett's body was found in a dumpster an hour ago. I thought you might like to know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because Daggett's name is all over the permits I pulled to map the tunnels under Gotham. Blake hands Gordon a stack of files. Foley glares at Blake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: maintenance, sewer construction...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where did you get to with the tunnel searches?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Remind me to tell the detail to keep hotheads out. (To Gordon.) We've had teams down there, but it's a huge network -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get more men, work a grid. I want him found.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yeah, yeah - the masked man. We're on it. Gordon eyes the files hungrily - glances up at Blake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is good work. Lose the uniform - you're working for me now. We could use some hotter heads around here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This could just be a coincidence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a detective now, son, you're not allowed to believe in coincidence anymore. Blake tries to conceal his excitement from Foley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne, covering his head with a newspaper, hurries up the driveway in the rain. Steps into the alcove. Hits the bell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S) Nobody's answering. Wayne turns to find Miranda there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I'm on my own now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you have keys? Wayne looks a little helpless all of a sudden.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never needed them... She takes his hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's find a window.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They force the French windows - enter, brushing off the rain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox worked the board like you've never seen - I'm in, Daggett's out and he's not happy. Wayne sets down the newspaper:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hope you don't like me for your money. Miranda kicks off her shoes. Glances at the paper.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Suffering builds character. Then at a photo of Wayne's parents.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll take care of your parents' legacy, Bruce. Miranda picks up a photo of Rachel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's this? Wayne looks at her. Can't find words...
