direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where's Alfred?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He left. Taking everything. Miranda puts the photo down. Kisses him. Passionately. Then again. He kisses back. Suddenly the lights go out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think my power's been shut off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne watches as Miranda tends to a roaring fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're pretty good at that.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I was a child we had almost nothing. But on the nights we had a fire, we felt very rich indeed. She returns to him, pulling a blanket around both of them.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I assumed your family was wealthy.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not always. Not when I was young. He traces a scar on her shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An old mistake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've made a few myself. She turns to him, tracing the scars across his chest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More than a few... (Smiles.) We could leave. Tonight. Take my plane. Go anywhere we wanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Someday perhaps. Not tonight. She pulls him close. He kisses her. They fold into each other, the warm heart at the center of a vast, cold room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miranda is sleeping, wrapped in the blanket. Wayne studies her for a moment, then slips out...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne moves to the Batsuit. Picks up the cowl.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Bat roars towards downtown. Batman kills the lights and main engines - the Bat quietly autorotates into the canyons.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Catwoman on a wall, watching trains go by. She senses...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't be shy. ...Batman is there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne says you can get me the 'Clean Slate'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That depends.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On what you want it for. I acquired it to keep it out of the wrong hands.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Still don't trust me, huh? How can we change that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Start by taking me to Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You asked. Catwoman jumps down. Batman follows. Catwoman leads him down into a service tunnel...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Catwoman speaks over her shoulder as she walks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: From here, Bane's men patrol the tunnels...and they are not your average brawlers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Neither am I. Catwoman swings into a -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercenary patrols. Catwoman comes up behind.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He's behind you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who? Batman hangs upside down behind him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Me. Darkness smashes onto the Mercenary. Gunfire in the tunnel. Catwoman races along, pursued by a Mercenary. He is yanked off his feet by darkness - he screams... Batman picks off more and more Mercenaries. Screams echo... Batman follows Catwoman through the dark tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just a little further. A grate slams down, separating them - the lights come on. He is deep inside.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercenaries look down on him from above. Catwoman turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I had to find a way to stop them trying to kill me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've made a serious mistake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Not as serious as yours, I fear. Batman turns. Bane emerges from behind the waterfalls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's not stand on ceremony here, Mr. Wayne. Catwoman hears the name. Less sure of what she's done. Batman moves at Bane - strikes powerful blows - Bane catches his fist.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Peace has cost you strength. Victory has defeated you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Bane SMASHES Batman back - kicks him off the catwalk - Batman drops, uses his cape to land. Bane climbs down on a chain - his men watch in disciplined silence - Batman hurls flashbangs at Bane, who doesn't flinch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Theatricality and deception are powerful agents...to the uninitiated. Batman lashes out at Bane - Bane counters - they separate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But we are initiated, aren't we, Bruce? The League of Shadows. And you betrayed us...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Us? You were excommunicated. From a gang of psychopaths.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now I am the League of Shadows, here to fulfill R 's al Gh l's A U destiny... Batman hurls himself at Bane, throwing him into the waterfall, where he smashes his fists and gauntlets into Bane's mask again and again, water cascading over them. Bane is not moving. Just taking the blows. Batman pauses. Bane's arms SHOOT OUT, SMASHING Batman aside - Bane RISES...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You fight like a younger man. Nothing held back. No reserves. Admirable. But mistaken. Batman hits a switch on his belt - the lights go out - Bane turns slowly addressing all the shadows at once.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think darkness is your ally. But you merely adopted the dark. I was born in it. Formed by it... In the shadows, Batman circles, looking to strike...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I didn't see the light until I was already a man. And by then it was nothing to me but blinding...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Bane lunges backwards into the darkness - Batman's throat in his grasp.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The shadows betray you, because they belong to me... Bane SMASHES him into the ground, POUNDING, pounding, pounding the hard cowl with his bare fists until it CRACKS. Bane RISES from Batman, gestures to the ceiling of the chamber - explosive charges have been drilled into holes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I will show you where I've made my home while preparing to bring justice. Then...I will break you. A Mercenary tosses Bane a detonator - Batman watches through cracked cowl - Bane hits the detonator - explosions BURST over his head as the ceiling CRUMBLES revealing: Applied Sciences - Bane has dropped the bottom out of Fox's weapons store...a camouflage Tumbler rests in the rubble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your precious armory. Gratefully accepted. We will need it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercenaries race through the stacks of equipment...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Batman climbs to his feet, swaying. Bane approaches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I wondered which would break first - your spirit... Batman SWINGS at him - misses - Bane GRABS him, lifts him
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . ...or your body. Bane brings Batman down onto his knee, BREAKING his back with a horrific CRACK.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . In the shadows, Catwoman looks on. Shocked. Bane crouches to pull the broken cowl off the broken Wayne. Mercenaries lift Wayne's body and carry him off... Bane stares into the hollow eyes of his trophy... Catwoman slinks back into the shadows, and we -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake's cruiser pulls up. He noses up to the windows. Nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake sits in his cruiser. Selina exits, wide-brimmed hat, bags. Blake recognizes her. She hails a cab.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get Commissioner Gordon. Tell him I've got a line on the Congressman's kidnapping. Blake pulls out to follow.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina moves through the terminal. She clocks a Uniform Cop staring at her - ducks down a service hallway.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Uniform rounds the corner to find Selina applying make-up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Excuse me, Miss. I need to see your ticket and identification, please. Selina, surprised, fumbles with her purse.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Would you mind?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . She hands the Uniform her hat - punches him through the brim, stuffs him in a closet - plants her mangled hat on his head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina makes her way down the jetway - spots Security at the far end - turns - Blake smiles at her. Badge in hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina, now in cuffs, looks up as Blake walks in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I showed your picture to the Congressman and guess what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't tell me, still in love?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Head over heels. Pressing charges, though. Blake lays a police file down with a thump. You've made some mistakes, Ms. Kyle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Girl's gonna eat.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have an appetite. Why run? You can't hide from us with this record.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe it's not you I'm running from.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who then? Bane? What do you know about him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That you should be as afraid of him as I am.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can offer you protection... Selina looks at him with contempt. Blake shrugs, switches off the tape, moves to the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When I spotted you, I was looking for a friend...Bruce Wayne. Selina turns to look at Blake. His eyes plead with her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did they kill him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not sure. And we -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Sounds: screaming, laughing, CRYING. Sights:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: bodies FALLING, a DARK SKULL... And we are -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne opens his eyes. Unshaven. Filthy. Someone else is in the cell - Wayne cannot move to look - even the attempt is painful...the skull drifts into his sight. Bane. Squatting at Wayne's bedside, muscled shoulders curving into his mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why didn't you just kill me?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't fear death. You welcome it. Your punishment is to be more severe.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're a torturer...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. But not of your body. Of your soul. Wayne exhales. Eyes losing focus from sheer pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where am I?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Home. Wayne's eyes dart about: filthy stone walls, distant sunlight from above, iron bars: an underground prison. Where I learned the truth about despair. As will you. (Rises.) There is a reason that this prison is the worst hell on earth... Bane steps to the bars - looks up at a bright opening five hundred feet above. Like being at the bottom of a gigantic well... Hope. Every man who has rotted here over the centuries has looked up to the light and imagined climbing to freedom. So simple. So easy. And, like shipwrecked men turning to sea water from uncontrollable thirst, many have died trying. I learned that there can be no true despair without hope. (Turns to Wayne.) So as I terrorize Gotham, I will feed its people hope to poison their souls. I will let them believe they can survive so that you can watch them clamber over each other to stay in the sun... Bane points to an old TV, just outside the bars. You will watch as I torture an entire city to cause you pain you thought you could never feel again. Then, when you have truly understood the depths of your failure, we will fulfill R 's al A Gh l's destiny. We will destroy U Gotham. And when it is done...when Gotham is ashes...then you have my permission to die. Bane rises. Leaves. Wayne drifts back to unconsciousness.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A van pulls through the gate. Selina, inside the van, looks up at the formidable grey building.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Guards lead Selina down the cells. Whistles and catcalls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're locking her up in here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Dent Act allows non-segregation based on extraordinary need. First time she broke out of women's correctional she was sixteen. Selina passes a Huge Inmate who strains through the bars...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Little closer, baby...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why, honey, you wanna hold my hand? Without breaking step, she slips his outstretched hands between her handcuffed ones and cartwheels, snapping his arms - he screams in agony - she keeps walking...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She'll be just fine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox comes out of the elevator with Miranda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't see the need for a board meeting on the energy project -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bruce got a lot of things right. Keeping the board in the dark wasn't one of them... Fox swings the doors to the boardroom open...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The board is there. Scared. At the head of the table - Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This meeting is called to order. Fox and Miranda freeze. Staring at the mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Chair and President. I also need one ordinary member - Mr. Fox, would you care to nominate?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I volunteer. The dignified older board member gets to his feet. Mercernaries round the three up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where are you taking us?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where you buried your resources. The bowels of Gotham.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon, with a Nurse's help, pulls himself to a seated position as Blake watches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So you think our friend is gone again?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This time...he might not be coming back. Gordon takes this in...Foley bursts in, agitated.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay, Commissioner, you were right.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What's happened?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your masked man kidnapped the Wayne Enterprises board. He let most of them go, but took three down into the sewers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No more patrols, no more hide and seek. Send every available cop down there to smoke him out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mayor won't want panic -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: So it's a training exercise. Foley looks at Gordon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry for not taking you
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't apologize for believing the world's in better shape then it is...just fight to make it true. Foley nods. Leaves. Blake gets up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not you. You're telling me the Batman's gone. So you chase up the Daggett leads, any way you can. Blake nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne lies, weak, feverish. A Prisoner drips water onto his parched lips. An elderly Blind Prisoner squatting by the wall in the next cell rasps something in an ancient tongue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He asks if you would pay us to let you die. I told him you have nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do it for the pleasure. The Prisoner puts bread to Wayne's lips.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They pay me more than that to keep you alive. A chant gets Wayne's attention. He rolls his head painfully to watch a Tattooed Prisoner hand a thick rope to a Strong Man, who ties it around his chest, watched by other Prisoners.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He will try the climb. Strong Man starts scaling the wall. The Prisoners' chant grows stronger as he climbs towards the light. Above: Strong Man stops, perched on a ledge, a twelve-foot leap from the rest of the climb... The chanting peaks as Strong Man leaps...misses...falls. The rope catches - he swings into the rock face. Prisoners fall silent as Strong Man is lowered, broken, bloody, to the prison floor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Has anyone made it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course not. The Blind Prisoner barks at him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does he say?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He says there is one who did. A child...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: a child of about ten looks up towards the light.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A child who had been born in this hell...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An old legend. Nothing more. The Prisoner leaves Wayne's cell - switches on the TV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever they want you to see...it's happening soon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane's men lead Fox, Miranda and Fredericks through the debris. Fox stares at Mercenaries working on his old inventions...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: s and Cops mass around entrances to sewers, tunnels...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane leads Fox and the others to where Mercenaries plant charges on a hewn wall. Dr. Pavel is here. Waiting. Bane nods at his men. The wall blows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: team about to enter a sewer pipe hear a low echoing boom. They look at each other, then head in. Thousands of Police head into manholes, tunnel entrances, checking weapons, using flashlights...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane leads the way over rubble into the REACTOR. Dr. Pavel follows. Bane approaches the machine. Turns to Fox.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Turn it on. Fox shakes his head. Bane holds his gun to Fredericks' head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I only need one other board member. There are eight more waiting upstairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I won't do it. Fredericks trembles. Bane cocks the weapon.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Alright, stop. She walks up to the scanner. Places her hand on it. It beeps. She turns to Fox. Quietly pleading.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lucius, you'll kill this man and yourself, and barely slow them down. Fox reluctantly puts his hand on the scanner. Then Fredericks. The core glows brighter and brighter. Dr. Pavel is transfixed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do your work. Bane turns to his men. Gestures at the hostages. Take them to the surface. People of their status deserve to see the next era of western civilization. Fox, Miranda and Fredericks are led back into the rubble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mayor, flanked by Security, talks to a crowd of Reporters.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're seeing literally thousands of police heading into the sewers -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A training exercise, that's all. If you'll excuse me, I've got tickets to watch our boys thrash Rapid City. The Mayor heads into the stadium with the crowds...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hundreds of SWATs wade, flashlights swinging, heading towards the center... Teams are converging from different entry points...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake is on the phone.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I've been to half Daggett's cement plants, logged locations they've poured for underground construction...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Anything strange about the pourings? Blake glances at a large map - dots mark pouring locations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honestly, Commissioner, I don't know anything about civil engineering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But you know about patterns. Keep looking. Blake pulls up in front of a cement plant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dr. Pavel finishes his work. Turns to Bane. Grave.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PAVEL It's done. This is now a four-megaton nuclear bomb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to his men) Pull the core out of the reactor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PAVEL (HORRIFIED) You can't. This is the only power source capable of sustaning it - if you move it, the core will decay in a matter of months.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Five, by my calculations.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PAVEL And then it will go off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the sake of your family, Dr. Pavel, I hope so. Dr. Pavel stares as Mercenaries start to disconnect the core...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake is led through a fence by a Worker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Boss is about to leave. Blake walks past cement mixers. Spots someone. A Driver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hey. The Driver turns.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That was you outside the stock exchange, right?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When? When half the city's cops were trying to pull onto Castle Street and your truck shut them out.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh yeah. You're that cop -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Detective, now. Behind Blake the Worker puts his hand is his pocket...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And as a detective...I'm not allowed to believe in coincidences
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake spins, drawing his weapon. The Worker lunges with a knife, Blake smashes his hand to one side and shoots him. The Driver grabs him from behind. Blake wrestles, but the Driver is strong, trained. Blake can't aim his gun, he fires behind, into a steel mixer - the bullets ricochet, one catches the Driver in the back and he goes down... Blake, gasping, kneels beside the Driver.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What were you doing?! What?! The man dies. Blake looks down at his gun. Disgusted. Tosses is down. Pulls out his phone. Dials.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commissioner, I'm at the Fourteenth Street plant with two dead witnesses and a lot of questions. Call me - Blake freezes, stooped to pick up his gun. Looking at some empty barrels... Commissioner, they've got Polyisobutylene here... (Looks around.) And motor oil. They weren't making cement, they were making explosives -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake grabs his carts - scanning the pattern of the dots - realizes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, God. Blake fires up the cruiser and pulls out, hard.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake is driving furiously, shouting into the radio -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Patch me into Foley!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley's overseeing the operation -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're heading into a trap!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley, concerned, takes the radio from a colleague.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's a trap! Pull everyone out! Bane's been pouring concrete laced with explosives - 100.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's a ring around the tunnels - they're gonna blow it and trap the cops underground! Foley looks up with dread at the mouth of the tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pull out! Pull 'em out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercenaries rise from a hole in the floor - Bane emerges...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mayor, in a corporate box, mouths the National Anthem...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mercenaries pull out detonators. Bane listens to the kickoff like a hunting dog sensing the wind...decides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let the games begin. The Mercenaries hit the detonators.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: s react - the tunnel roof behind collapses... Chunks of concrete structure drop - thousands of police throughout different tunnels are trapped...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The crowd goes wild as a Receiver catches - starts a run - the Mayor looks on, suddenly confused. As the Receiver sprints for the end zone, the field behind him DROPS away in smoking ruins, swallowing Players... The crowd is not cheering but SCREAMING... The Mayor's box
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Receiver, nearing the touchdown, glances back - sees Armageddon - the entire field is now a smoking mass of rubble, but for one strip of turf...Mercenaries pour out of the tunnel, creating a gauntlet...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake's cruiser swerves to avoid eruptions of asphalt. An eruption TOSSES Blake's cruiser onto its roof.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All bridges, except the Gotham Bridge, suffer controlled demolitions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane steps into the smoking stadium, a gladiator walking into the arena...TV cameras swing onto him. Passing a dead umpire, he takes the men's headset - surveys the screaming crowd, lifts an arm for silence, raises the mike to his mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gotham, take control of your city...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake squeezes out of his cruiser, reaches in for the radio.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jesus, Blake! Every cop in the city's down in those tunnels!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not every cop... Blake pulls the shotgun from his cruiser - flags down a car.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon's heart-rate monitor alarms. Gordon wakes, groggy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Patients and Doctors crowd the entrance. mercenaries with automatic weapons force their way in - hit the stairwell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake drives, swerving around dazed and terrified people. Flames and smoke billow from the sewers.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake races up to the hospital entrance.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Two Mercenaries move room to room, searching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon pulls himself out of his bed, wheeling his IV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake jumps into the corridor, gun raised. Shots echo down the hall - Blake sprints.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake leaps into the room, gun high - freezes as warm metal touches the base of his skull.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Clear the corners, rookie. Blake turns. Gordon holds his service weapon. The Mercenaries are on the ground, dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get my coat, son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercenaries pull the glowing core onto the field.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is the instrument of your liberation...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Analysts and military personnel assess the situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Satellite shows a radiation spike...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whatever it is...it's nuclear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mercenaries thrust Dr. Pavel to his knees before Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Identify yourself to the world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PAVEL Dr. Leonid Pavel, nuclear physicist. Bane turns Dr. Pavel's head for the cameras.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Armed Forces and Intelligence staff scramble to verify.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pavel was confirmed dead - plane crash on an Agency pull-out of Uzbekistan... But it certainly looks like him - He points to a monitor with a photo of Dr. Pavel. An Air Force General rubs his chin, thinking, nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: s streak over the river, sizing up the island.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane rests his powerful hand on Dr. Pavel's shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tell the world what this is.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PAVEL A fully primed neutron bomb. With a blast radius of six miles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And who can disarm this device?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . PAVEL Only me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you, Doctor. Bane snaps Dr. Pavel's neck in front of the world.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bomb is armed, the bomb is mobile, the identity of the triggerman is a mystery. One of you holds the detonator - we come not as conquerors, but as liberators to return control of this city to the people. At the first sign of interference from the outside world or of people attempting to flee, this anonymous Gothamite, this unsung hero, will trigger the bomb. For now, martial law is in effect. Return to your homes, hold your families close, and wait. Tomorrow you claim what is rightfully yours. Bane turns, leaves the field, followed by his men.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The General breaks the silence.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pull back the fighters, start high-level reconnaissance flights. And get the President on the line.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercenaries hold the bridge. A tank rolls across from the mainland, soldiers behind. The Lead Mercenary uses a bullhorn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tanks and planes cannot stop us detonating our device. Send an emissary to discuss terms of access for supplies and communication. A Captain steps forward, walks to the apex of the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many of you are there, son? (Nothing.) You don't have enough men to stop twelve million people leaving that island.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We don't. But you do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why in the hell would we help you keep your hostages?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If people start crossing this bridge Gotham gets blown to hell. The Captain considers this. Troubled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As night falls the F-22's peel away from the fire-ringed city. The voice of the President echoes across the airwaves...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The people of our greatest city are resilient. They have proven this before, they will prove this again...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne stares at the old TV. At his burning city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We do not negotiate with terrorists, but we do recognize realities... Wayne starts to cry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake drives the deserted streets. Gordon is slumped in the passenger seat, listening.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the situation develops, one thing must be understood above all others... People of Gotham, we have not abandoned you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What does that mean?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It means we're on our own. I have to get in front of a camera -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir, they'll kill you the second you show your face -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Mayor's dead. I'm the symbol of law and order. Bane says he's giving Gotham back to the people - they need to know that I could lead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane's not gonna let that happen -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then he'll show his true colors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And you'll be dead. Gordon says nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three camouflage Tumblers roll down the deserted street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A crowd of news crews has gathered. Guards in the towers look down, apprehensive. The Tumblers roll up, stopping in front of the gates. Bane emerges from the lead Tumbler.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Behind you stands a symbol of oppression. Blackgate Prison...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prisoners strain to hear Bane's words. Selina is there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Where a thousand men have languished for years. Under the Dent Act. Under the name of this
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane holds up a photo of Harvey Dent.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Harvey Dent. Held up to you, and over you, as a shining example of justice and good...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon sits watching Bane's speech. Blake gathers supplies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We're gonna keep moving you, till we can get you in front of a camera -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane sets fire to the picture of Dent...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But they supplied you a false idol. A straw man. To placate. To stop you tearing down this corrupt city...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Prisoners start cheering, shouting.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) ...and rebuilding it the way it should have been rebuilt generations ago...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane drops the burning picture.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let me tell you the truth about Harvey Dent. In the words of Gotham's Police Commissioner, James Gordon...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This gets Blake's attention. Gordon watches, uneasy...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane unfolds the pages of Gordon's undelivered speech...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'The truth about Harvey Dent is simple in only one regard - it has been hidden for too long. After his devastating injuries, Harvey's mind has recovered no better than his mutilated face. He was a broken, dangerous man, not the crusader for justice that I, James Gordon, have portrayed him to be for the last eight years. Harvey's rage was indiscriminate. Psychopathic. He held my family at gunpoint, then fell to his death in the struggle over my son's life. The Batman did not murder Harvey Dent - he saved (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: my boy. Then took the blame for Harvey's appalling crimes, so that I could, to my shame, build a lie around this fallen idol.'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake stares at the TV, Gordon's face lowers into his hands...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: praised the madman who tried to murder my own child.'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The crowd is silent, stunned, as Bane continues to read.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'The things we did in Harvey's name brought desperately needed security to our streets... But I can no longer live with my lie. It is time to trust the people of Gotham with the truth, and it is time for me to resign.' Bane folds the papers. Looks out to the stunned crowd. Do you accept this man's resignation? Individuals in the crows start shouting 'Yes!'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Prisoners cheer, pounding against the bars. Selina watches...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do you accept the resignation of all the liars?! All the corrupt?! More and more of the crowd is chanting 'Yes!'
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake turns to Gordon, who stares at the TV.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: These men, locked up in Blackgate for eight years, denied parole under the Dent Act. Based on a lie.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A lie to keep a city from burning to the ground. Gotham needed a hero, someone to believe in -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not as much as it does now. But you betrayed everything you stood for.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (looks at Blake) There's a point. Far out there. When the structures fail you. When the rules aren't weapons anymore, they're shackles, letting the bad get ahead. Maybe one day you'll have such a moment of crisis. And in that moment, I hope you have a friend like I did. To plunge their hands into the filth so you can keep yours clean.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your hands look pretty filthy to me, Commissioner. Gordon stares at him. Blake goes back to packing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane signals a Tumbler - its turret turns to the prison doors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We take Gotham from the corrupt. The rich. The oppressors of generations who've kept you down with the myth of opportunity. And we give it to you, the people. Gotham is yours - none shall interfere. Do as you please... The Tumbler fires, blowing the doors to hell. (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But start by storming Blackgate and freeing the oppressed... Step forward, those who would serve... Bane's men surge through the burning gates...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Selina watches as Prisoners stream out of open cell doors. She makes her way quietly through the excited throng.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) For an army will be raised... Mercenaries hand out weapons to escaping Prisoners...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Mercenaries shoot open locks, people storm into expensive apartment buildings overlooking the park...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) The powerful will be ripped from their decadent nests...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: People ransack the apartment...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) ...and cast into the cold world the rest of us have known and endured...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wealthy people are herded onto the street by Mercenaries...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Courts will be convened...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A kangaroo court is in session, presided over by a Criminal we recognize from Blackgate. Bane watches from the gallery...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) The spoils will be enjoyed...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tough-looking Revellers crack open champagne - spraying it, swigging it - Selina amongst them, watching...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Blood will be shed...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Hundreds of Police living underground. Dividing up supplies lowered by ropes... Ross opens a pack of supplies.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) But the police will live, until they are ready to serve true justice...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Moving in on the bright glow of the core...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) This great city will endure... Close enough to see the flickering digits of its countdown...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) Gotham will survive. Mercenaries load the core into the back of a black truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne rolls off his cot. Grunts. The Prisoner realizes Wayne is trying to do a push-up. From the next cell, the Blind Prisoner says something...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He says you must first straighten your back. The Prisoner helps Wayne roll over, painfully.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How would he know?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was the prison doctor. A morphine addict who incurred the displeasure of powerful people. Including your masked friend.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Many years ago, during a time of plague, Bane was attacked by other prisoners. The doctor's fumbling attempts to repair the damage left him in perpetual agony. The mask holds his pain at bay.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Is Bane the child you spoke of? Was he born here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The legend is that there was a mercenary working for the local warlord who fell in love with his daughter. They married in secret. The Prisoner takes a rope - ties it under Wayne's arms.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When the warlord found out, he condemned the mercenary to this pit. But then exiled him instead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: the Mercenary is dropped at the side of a barren road. He starts to walk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The mercenary understood that the warlord's daughter had secured his release, but he couldn't know the true price of his freedom. She had taken his place in the pit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: a Woman is lowered into the prison. The prisoners below all have their faces covered with muslin masks...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And she was with the child. The mercenary's child.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: the Woman watches as the Doctor, (the Blind Prisoner, younger-looking, sighted) examines her small child. The Doctor exits, locking the cell...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: One day the doctor forgot the lock the cell...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: Prisoners move into the cell towards his mother. The child runs at them with a knife...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Innocence cannot flower underground. It was to be stamped out. But the child had a friend. A protector...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: the Protector, face covered, pulls the Child off the attackers. One grabs for the Child - the Protector snaps his arm, carries the Child into a corner...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ...who showed the others that this innocence was their redemption. The mother was not so lucky. The Blind Prisoner shouts at the Prisoner. He nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is Bane's prison now. Bane would not want this story told. The Prisoner pulls - Wayne screams in pain as he is pulled upright. The Prisoner ties him off. Checks his spine. You have a protruding vertebra...I'm going to force it back...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How -? The Prisoner punches Wayne in the back, hard. Wayne screams.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You stay like this. Until you stand. Wayne passes out from the pain and we FADE TO BLACK. Wayne is hanging in his cell, delirious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Did you not think I'd return, Bruce? R 's al Gh l, in his Ducard guise, steps in front of Wayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you I was immortal.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I watched you die.
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A U R 'S AL GH L A U
R 'S AL GH L A U

direction.raw_text: There are many forms of immortality. Wayne looks inward, remembering...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: R 's at the campfire (from Batman Begins).
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Once I had a wife. My great love. She was taken from me...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A R 'S AL GH L A U

direction.raw_text: CUT: the Woman is lowered into the prison... Wayne looks at R 's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You were the mercenary. Bane is your child. Your heir.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: the Mercenary at the side of the road. R 's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: An heir to ensure the League of Shadows fulfills its duty to restore balance to civilization.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: A R 'S AL GH L A U
R 'S AL GH L A U

direction.raw_text: You yourself fought the decadence of Gotham for years. With all your strength and resources, all your moral authority. And the only victory you could achieve was a lie. Finally you understand... Gotham is beyond saving...
direction.name: direction

result.heading: R 'S AL GH L A U

direction.raw_text: And must be allowed to die.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . And we are -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Snow blankets the street. A Tumbler carves tracks as it patrols the deserted street. Blake peers from behind a parked car - he is crouched, feeding a kite string down a storm drain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Ross strains to reach a note dangling on a string - he grasps it. All around him are dozens of Cops living underground...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake winds the string, picks up a jerrycan, hurries off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SWITHIN'S HOME FOR BOYS - CONTINUOUS The home is packed. People, not just kids, huddle in every corner. Blake spots Father Reilly. Hands him the can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For the bus in case there's a chance to evacuate. Keep it in here - people are siphoning parked cars.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Really?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How do you think I got it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Right. Any news? Is the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Less you know, Father. How're the boys?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Power's been on more, so they get some TV. Blake smiles. Moves to the door. Blake, you be careful out there. They're hunting down cops like dogs. Blake nods. Leaves.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Following Selina through rooms strewn with trash, empty bottles and sleeping partygoers. She spots a family photograph, glass smashed. A hand lands on her shoulder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who's that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This was someone's home.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now it's everyone's home. Selina stares out at a Tumbler rolling by.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Storm's coming', remember? This is what you wanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. It's what I thought I wanted.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Prisoner unties the rope from Wayne's chest. Wayne stands. Just. Then walks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne does push-ups. Stronger. The Prisoner watches.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why build yourself?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not meant to die in here. The Prisoner indicates the TV:
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: : DAY 84.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Here? There? What's the difference? Wayne ignores this. Focuses on his body...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne moves to the wall - takes the rope from the Tattooed Prisoner, wraps it around his chest. Curious Prisoners gather, the Prisoner at their head. Wayne looks up at the light, hundreds of feet above. Starts to climb. Prisoners get excited as Wayne RISES - money starts exchanging hands. Reaching the precipice, he checks his rope, looks up at the next handhold, far away. He takes a breath, then LEAPS. His fingers brush the ledge. Wayne DROPS a hundred feet - the rope catches, SLAMMING him into the rock face. The Prisoners disperse, losing interest as the Tattooed Prisoner lowers Wayne on the rope. The Blind Prisoner turns away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I told you it could not be done.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You told me a child did it...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No ordinary child...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: the Protector fights off prisoners as the Child, older now, moves to the climbing wall A child born in hell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: the Child makes the climb...pauses, looking down - making eye-contact with the Protector, who fights off Prisoners... They swarm over the Protector, knives drawn. A child forged by suffering, hardened by pain...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: the Child leaps across the abyss, grabbing a handhold on the ledge and swinging up... Not a man from privilege. Wayne's eyes close in despair.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Supply trucks await inspection. Mercenaries open an
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: wheeler - check boxes of rations...wave it on...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The 18-wheeler pulls up. A line of Gothamites waits patiently along the sidewalk.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Three plain-clothes Special Forces Men emerge from the boxes, checking, then concealing weapons. The doors open - they exit.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Special Forces Men carry boxes into the store as if delivering. The Store Manager leads them into the back and down into -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where they are met by four Cops out of uniform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You have ID?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Of course not.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can we trust you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) We don't have any choice. Gordon and Blake emerge from the back of the room.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commissioner Gordon? Captain Jones, Special Forces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain, glad to have you here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How many of you are there?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dozens. I'd rather not say exactly. But the men trapped underground number almost three thousand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What kind of shape they're in?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They've been getting water, food.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could we break them out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes, sir - take out the mercenaries guarding the outflow south of Ackerman Park, blow the rubble, you've got a hole big enough for ten at a time. I'm in contact with my partner - they're waiting for the day.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Men who haven't seen daylight for three months?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Men with automatic weapons who haven't seen daylight in three months.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the bomb? The satellites can't see any radiation hot spots...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake scouts with Jones. A rumble makes them turn.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) They keep it on a truck - it must have a lead-lined roof. They move it constantly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) But you know the truck?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) They've got three of them. The routes don't vary much. Two Tumblers lead a massive black truck down the street. Captain Jones reaches into his jacket and triggers a Geiger counter. Shows Blake the display. Nods. One of the Tumblers stops, turns back. Blake leads them down a side street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What about the triggerman?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No leads. It's a bluff - Bane wouldn't give control of that bomb to someone else.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We can't take that chance. Until we have the triggerman, we just track the device, smuggle men over -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: While Gotham lives under a warlord, like in some failed state?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dial it back, officer. This situation is unprecedented. We can't do anything to risk millions of lives.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Aren't you gonna tell him?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain, things are more complicated than you think. There's somebody you need to meet. Blake? Blake nods, leads Jones and his men up the stairs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake leads them to the door of an empty bank.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They head across the empty lobby to an elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake leads them into empty offices. Cots and makeshift furnishings line the offices and corridors.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I was up here looking for a vantage point. Found the people who run the corporation who owns it living here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Which corporation?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Wayne Enterprises. Lucius Fox is there, with Miranda Tate.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain, meet Mr. Fox. Mr. Fox, I'd like you to brief the Captain. Captain Jones indicates Miranda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miss Tate is fully aware of the situation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And as CEO of Wayne Enterprises, I have to take responsibility for it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Because, Captain, we built it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You built the bomb?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It was built as a fusion reactor. The first of its kind. Bane turned the core into a bomb, then disconnected it from the reactor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And here's the important part.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the device's fuel cells decay, it's becoming increasingly unstable...until the point of detonation.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bomb's a time bomb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And it will go off. In twenty-three days. Captain Jones reels at this news.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane's revolution is a sham. He's watching Gotham rearrange its deckchairs while the whole ship's going down. Your appeasement plan might not be as practical as you thought. Captain Jones throws Blake a look. Addresses Fox.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you disarm it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I don't know, But I could reconnect it to the reactor. Stabilize it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We'd have to let the Pentagon know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They'll be monitoring our
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have no choice. Let's move away from this location, then call it in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain Jones exits the elevator, followed by his men and Blake. Halfway across the floor, hell breaks loose. Mercenaries blast them with machine guns - the lobby becomes a devastating ambush. Blake dives back into the elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake flies out of the elevator.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox, somebody sold us out! Fox and Miranda burst into the corridor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Take Miranda - Blake grabs Miranda, heads for the back stairs. Mercenaries jump out of the elevator, firing high.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! Fox freezes. Lowers himself to the ground.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Captain Jones goes down in a hail of bullets. The other Special Forces Men are down. Bane enters, midges Jones with his toe. He is alive. Barely. Bane leans in close. Jones looks up at him, defiant.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll die before I talk...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm on your schedule, Captain. Bane places his hand over Jones's nose and mouth.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There were people living upstairs. Bane looks up, disinterested. Jones is dead.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give them over for judgement. (Indicates bodies.) Hang them where the world will see.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne stares at the TV: the Special Forces bodies hang in the cables of Gotham Bridge. Wayne throws a stone into the screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne does endless push-ups, squats, stretches. The Blind Prisoner listens. He speaks in an ancient tongue.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He says the leap to freedom is not about strength.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My body makes the jump.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Survival is the spirit. The soul.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My soul's as ready to escape as my body.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fear is why you fail.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm not afraid. I'm angry. Wayne throws punches...focused.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne takes the rope at the foot of the climb. Prisoners look up, but none bother to gather round. Wayne starts climbing, determined. He FIGHTS the rock face...breathing hard. Grabs at a rock - it comes away in his hand. He DROPS - SMASHES into the rock face. The Blind Prisoner shakes his head. A Skinny Prisoner playing cards with the Prisoner looks up at Wayne, hanging upside down.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Shouldn't you get him down? The Prisoner glances up at Wayne, disdainful.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He'll keep. As Wayne drifts into unconsciousness we -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: Young Bruce lies at the bottom of the well, looking up at his father, lowering down to rescue him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) And why do we fall?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne wakes with a start - the Blind Prisoner is there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You do not fear death. You think this makes you strong. This makes you weak.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How can you move faster then possible? Fight longer than possible? If not from the most powerful impulse of the spirit. The fear of death. The will to survive. Wayne gets up onto his elbow. Looks at the Blind Prisoner.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I do fear death. I fear dying in here while my city burns with no one there to save it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Then make the climb.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As the child did. Without the rope. (Dry laugh.) Then fear will find you again. Wayne considers this.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne puts some scraps of bread into a rough coat which he folds into a makeshift shoulder pack.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Supplies for your journey? Prisoners nearby laugh. Wayne moves to the cliff face. The Prisoner follows, intrigued by Wayne's new demeanor. The Tattooed Prisoner offers him the rope. Wayne refuses. Starts to climb. Prisoners gather around as word spreads. Wayne makes his way cautiously up the treacherous rock face. Down below the Prisoners start a low chant. As Wayne hoists himself up onto the precipice something
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: from the cliff face. Wayne flinches - BATS... They circle up to the opening above... Wayne closes his eyes. The chant RISES. Wayne takes a breath...opens his eyes...looks down at the drop...up again...then he jumps. Time skips a beat as the Prisoners stop breathing. And Wayne GRABS the ledge above. The Prisoners go WILD as Wayne hoists himself up onto the ledge. The Blind Prisoner nods. Wayne climbs to FREEDOM.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne climbs out of the hole and into formidable desolation. He shoulders his pack - spots a large coil of rope attached to the wall. He pushes it into the hole then walks away...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A mass of huddled Gothamites. Professionals (traders, industrialists). In a corner, Fox. Mercenaries come down into the chamber, pull out a man, who starts yelling. It is Stryver, Daggett's functionary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I want to see Bane! There's been a mistake! Take me to Bane! Fox watches him dragged upstairs...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A kangaroo court. Stryver is dragged before a jeering crowd.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's been a mistake! Where's Bane?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) There's been no mistake, Mr. Stryver. Stryver turns to look at the 'judge': Dr. Jonathan Crane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You are Philip Stryver, executive vice-president of Daggett Industries? (Off nod from Stryver.) The same Philip Stryver who for years lived like a prince off the blood and sweat of people less powerful?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Call Bane! I'm one of you! Jeers. Pull back to reveal a silent figure, watching. Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane has no authority here. This is merely a sentencing hearing. The choice is yours, death or exile. Stryver looks around, terrified, as the crowd shouts 'Death'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Exile.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sold...to the man in the cold sweat! Mercenaries pull Stryver from the dock...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stryver, with other wealthy Gothamites, is led down to the ice. A Blackgate Inmate undoes his handcuffs, whispering.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Follow the tick ice. Try to swim - you're dead in minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Has anyone made it? The Blackgate Inmate turns away. Stryver is forced onto the ice. He shuffles forward, listening to the creaking... Stryver is a hundred yards out when the river swallows him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon stands over a map of the city. A handful of Cops sit around the room. Waiting. Gordon looks at his watch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Where the hell are they? It's not like we have a lot of time, here.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The bomb goes off tomorrow. We've got about eighteen hours to do something.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To do what?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We mark that truck. Get a GPS on it, then we can start thinking about how to take it down. The door opens and Blake enters, followed by ten cops. Gordon is counting them in. He moves to Blake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's it? Blake just looks at him. Gordon checks the faces. Realizes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley. Where's Foley, dammit?! Gordon heads for the door.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You shouldn't be out on the streets -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon hurries up the steps to a brownstone. Stabs the bell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jim. He's not here - Gordon, furious, addresses the hallway behind her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're sending your wife to the door when the city's under occupation?! Foley appears at the end of the corridor. Ashamed.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wait in the kitchen, honey.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What did you do, bury your uniform in the backyard?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Jim, you saw what they did to those Special Forces.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You forgotten all the years we went out on patrol with every gangbanger wanting to plant one as soon as our backs were turned?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This is different and you know it. These guys run the city - the government's done a deal with them -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Deal?! Bane's got their balls in a vice. That's not a deal -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You move against Bane, the triggerman's gonna hit the button - 131.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think he's given control of that bomb to one of 'the people'?! You think this is part of some revolution? There's one man with his finger on the button - Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We have to keep our heads down until they can fix this. If you still had family here maybe you'd -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This only gets fixed from inside the city, Foley. (Calmer.) Look, I'm not asking you to walk down Grand in your dress blues. But we've got to do something before this maniac blows us all to hell.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm sorry Jim. I gotta -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Keep your head down? What's that gonna do tomorrow, when that thing blows?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You don't know that's going to happen. Foley closes the door on Gordon. Gordon stands there.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S) I hear you're looking for men, Commissioner. Gordon turns to see Miranda, Blake behind her. Blake shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How about me, instead?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miss Tate, I can't ask you -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My company built it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bruce Wayne built it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And he wanted to destroy it. It was me who didn't listen. Please. Gordon looks at Blake. Then Miranda. Nods.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Let's go.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Kid sprints down the deserted street, chased by two Gangbangers. The Kid slips in the snow - the men are on him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You steal from us, you little bastard? They grab the Kid's backpack, the Gangbanger pulls out an apple, moves to hit the Kid when - SMACK! - his hand is grabbed, and the apple flies into the air as his arm cracks. Selina catches the apple.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You boys know you can't come into my neighborhood without asking politely. Gangbanger 2 lunges with a knife - she spins him, making him stab himself in the backside. The Gangbangers run off, howling. The Kid eyes her, wary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Never steal anything from someone you can't outrun, kid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Now you're gonna take it. Selina looks at the red apple. Takes one perfect bite.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Just tax. She tosses him the apple. He takes it and runs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Pretty generous, for a thief. Selina recognizes the voice. Turns to find Wayne - strong, but weathered. Beard, work clothes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You came back. I thought they'd killed you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're expecting an apology -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It wouldn't suit you. I need your help.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: And why would I help you? Wayne pulls a USB drive out of his pocket.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: For this. The 'Clean Slate'.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You're gonna trust me with that? After what I did to you?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I admit I felt a little let down. But I still think there's more to you. In fact, I think for you - (indicates USB) this isn't a tool, it's an escape route. You want to disappear. Start fresh. She looks at him. Takes the drive, staring at it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Start fresh? I can't even get off this island.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I can give you a way off. Once you've gotten me to Lucius Fox. I need you to find out where they're holding him. Then take me in.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why do you need Fox?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To save this city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Who says it needs saving? Maybe I like it this way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Maybe you do. But tomorrow that bomb's going off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get your powerful friend on the case.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'm trying. But I need Fox.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon and his Men are in two-man teams. Gordon is walking down the street with Miranda. He hands her a Geiger counter.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay further up the block. (Points at Men.) They're gonna cross the street and try and slow the truck down. As it approaches, hit this button. If the needle hits two hundred - give me the signal and I mark the truck. Okay?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Heads up. Blake is up on a rooftop. Gordon moves down to the other end of the block. As the truck rumbles into view, Gordon's Men walk out into the street in front of it as if crossing the road. The convoy barely slows. Miranda gives Gordon the signal. As the truck comes past, he tosses a magnetic GPS locator at the lower part of the truck... Gordon regroups with his Men on the corner. Checks his GPS.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Got it. They keep moving, turning down the next street...into an ambush. Dozens of Mercenaries, weapons trained.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Commissioner Gordon, you're under arrest.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On whose authority?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The people of Gotham. Blake, from his vantage point, watches Gordon, Miranda and the other Cops being rounded up and led away...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Miranda comforts a crying Woman in the corner. Thugs come down the stairs, laughing, leading a Hooded Prisoner. They kick him down the last step and he stumbles. Fox moves to his aid.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Find this one a spot, he's got a big day tomorrow. They dump the Hooded Man with Fox.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We all do. It's not every day you bag Bruce Wayne... Fox hears this. Pulls the bag from Wayne's head. Wayne nods at him, silent. Fox nods back. The Thugs leave. Miranda comes over.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bruce?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You picked a hell of a time to go on vacation, Mr. Wayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: How long until the core ignites?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That bomb goes off in twelve hours.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Unless we can connect it to the reactor.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you can get it there. I'll find a way to plug it back in. (Indicates Miranda.) Can you get Miranda out?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not tonight. I'm sorry.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Do what's necessary.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Tonight I need you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What for?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To get me back in the game. Catwoman comes down the stairs with the Thugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry to spoil things, boys, but Bane wants these guys himself... The thugs pull Wayne and Fox to their feet - Miranda looks up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I won't forget about you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I know.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Thugs lead Wayne and Fox along the colonnade. Catwoman spins, takes out one Thug with a heel, one with a punch to the throat. Fox smiles as she unlocks his wrists.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I like your girlfriend, Mr. Wayne.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He should be so lucky. And she's gone. Fox turns to Wayne. Who shrugs.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Lights flicker on... Wayne and Fox are in the Bat-Bunker.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Any move I make against Bane or the bomb - the triggerman sets it off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They can't be using radio or cell - too much interference. Infrared doesn't have the range. It could only be micro-burst long wave... Wayne opens a panel in the wall, takes out equipment: mini-mines, Batarangs, utility belt...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Could you block it?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Yes. I need the EMP cannon-guidance mount from the Bat. You remember where you parked? Wayne nods. Smiles. The Batsuit rises from the floor...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon and his men on trial. Crane presides.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The charges are espionage and attempted sabotage... Do you have anything to say in your defense?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No lawyer, no witnesses. What sort of due process is this?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: More than you give Harvey's prisoners, Commissioner. Your guilt is determined, this is merely a sentencing hearing. What's it to be, death or exile?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Crane, if you think we are going willingly out onto that ice, you've got another think coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Death, then?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Looks that way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Very well... Death... (Smiles.) By exile. He smashes his gavel. Bane leans in to one of his men, indicates Miranda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bring her to me.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Wayne bounds up the stairs. Fox follows, out of breath
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I think it's time to talk about my year-end bonus...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox emerges to see Wayne uncovering the Bat... As the sun sets, Fox starts pulling apart the gun mount.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: She fly pretty well?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Even without the autopilot...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Autopilot? That's what you're there for.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon and the rest of the men stand at the edge of the ice. A Mercenary fires his gun in the air. Gordon takes a breath, then leads his men onto the ice...which creaks and groans... Further out, Gordon stops - sniffs - looks down: a pool of liquid, beside it: a flare. Gordon picks it up, puzzled.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S.) Light it up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Gordon, energized by the familiar voice, lights the flare - jams it into the liquid, sending a trail of FIRE across the ice - up into a building where it forms the shape of a
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Dad! Check it out!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Honey, take a look! Foley moves to a back window. Sees the flaming sign.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercenary nervously approaches Bane's back.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sir? Bane turns. The Mercenary points at the sign.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You think it's really him?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Impossible...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Foley yanks up the floorboards. Pull his dress blues from their hiding place.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Mercenaries guarding the entrance see the sign. One of them moves out to get a better look. WHAM! He is taken out by a dark figure. The figure steps into the light - it is Blake...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Batman hands Gordon a metal box.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: This blocks the remote detonator signal to the bomb. Get it onto the truck by sunrise. They might hit the button when it starts.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: When what starts?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: War.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake takes out a second Mercenary - moves over to the open manhole. Ross emerges - nots at Blake, who helps him climb out. BANG - Ross goes down as Blake dives for cover. Blake is grabbed by Mercenaries. They detonate the manhole, sealing it, prepare to execute Blake. A dark shape drops onto the Mercenaries... Blake watches, in awe, as Batman takes them out in a fury of punches and kicks - then it is finished. Quiet. One of the Mercenaries moves slightly.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You missed a spot. Batman boots him in the head as he moves towards Blake.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: If you're working alone, wear a mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one cares who I am.
direction.name: direction
