direction.raw_text: The mask is not for you. It's to protect the people you care about.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Huh. And you always seem to know where those people are. How is that?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I lost someone once. Since then I break into their homes when they're sleeping and implant a tracking device on the back of their neck. Blake laughs. Then feels the back of his neck. Batman tosses Blake a mini-mine.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: On three - one, two, three - They throw the mini-mines at the rubble of the entrance - the blasts barely move any rubble.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No offense, but you got anything bigger in that belt?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's to warn the men on the other side. Batman disappears into the shadows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But how do we -?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: ! The Bat's cannons light up the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Okay. Cops climb out into the cold night - skinny, ragged, but glad to be alive and carrying guns...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: What now?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: All-out assault on Bane...but you need to get the people you care about across the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Why?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: In case we fail. Lead an exodus across the bridge. Save as many lives as you can.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't you need me here?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You've given me an army. Now go. Blake nods. Turns to leave. Stops.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Thank you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Don't thank me yet.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I might not get a chance later. Batman nods. Blake disappears into the night.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon checks the metal box. Puts it under his coat. Nods at his men, hiding in the doorways. Checks his GPS...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Batman leads Catwoman to a rusty old container. He opens it, revealing the Bat-Pod. Catwoman's eyes light up.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Oh, you shouldn't have... She hops on, feeling the controls.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The mid-town tunnel's blocked by debris, but the cannons give you enough firepower to make a path for people. Catwoman marvels at the controls...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: To start it, you -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I got it.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: We've got forty-five minutes to save this city -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No, I've got forty-five minutes to get clear of the blast radius, because you don't stand a chance against these guys.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: With your help I might. She shakes her head.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I'll open that tunnel, then I'm gone. He looks at her.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's more to you than that. She stares back at him. Facade slipping a touch.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Sorry to keep letting you down. He says nothing. She looks at him, imploring. Come with me. Save yourself. You don't owe these people anymore - you've given them everything...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not everything. Not yet. Batman turns. Catwoman watches him go. Then fires up the bike and takes off.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Catwoman tears along on the Bat-Pod. She pulls up at the tunnel entrance blocked by stacked vehicles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The army of Cops stands at the low end of the street. At the op is Bane's stronghold - City Hall. Men pour out of the building, forming up into an opposing line. A Cop wearing full dress blues steps forward. It is Foley. The silence is eerie... The numbers look evenly matched - until two Tumblers arrive.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: DISPERSE. DISPERSE OR BE FIRED UPON. The Cops look shaky, pale, but determined.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There's only one police in this city. He steps forward. The line follows.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane stands in the colonnade. Watching.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Open fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Tumblers FIRE into the line of Cops, THROWING men into the air, SCREAMING. The line of Cops is about to scatter -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . The Bat DROPS down in front of the Cops and
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: both Tumblers, FLIPPING them sideways. The Bat RISES and the cops run towards the Mercenaries, firing - until they are close enough to fight hand-to-hand. The street is filled with thousands of men in pitched battle.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Catwoman, hearing the distant battle, blasts the tunnel blockage...the dust settles. Her path is clear.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon heard the fighting. Checks the box. Nervous.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Come on, come on...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane strides through the battle, taking out Cops left and right. A space clears - he is face the face with the Batman...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You came back. To die with your city.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No. I came back to stop you.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . Bane leaps at Batman, smashing powerful blows into his head. Batman ducks, weaves and smashes his fists into Bane's side. Someone is watching from the window of City Hall - Miranda.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The black truck rounds the corner. Gordon signals his man in a Greyhound bus - who pulls across the street. The truck smashes into the bus and stops. Gordon and his men swarm in, blasting at the Guards. Gordon opens the back - empty. No bomb. Wrong truck.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: That's impossible... Come on! Cut over to Fifth! They sprint for the next parallel avenue...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox hurries into the reactor - starts throwing switches...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . SWITHIN'S HOME FOR BOYS - CONTINUOUS Blake leads the boys out of the home - points down the street.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Knock on doors, spread the word - the bomb's going to blow! Get out by the South Street tunnel, or over the bridge! Do two blocks, then get back to the bus! The boys race down the street. Father Reilly climbs into the bus.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Batman and Bane fight, Batman pushing Bane back - a Tumbler roars between them, separating them. Batman chases after.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane SMASHES backwards through the door, Batman on him. Batman POUNDS Bane against the marble floor. Mercenaries guarding Miranda move towards them -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay back. He is mine - Bane SMASHES Batman's head - moves in for the kill, but Batman SMASHES Bane to the ground, RIPS sideways across the tubes of Bane's mask with the blades of his forearm. Bane bellows, thrashing in AGONY. Batman holds him down with a hand on his throat - searches him with his free hand.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me the trigger! You'd never give it to an ordinary citizen - Bane's thrashing calms as he stares at Batman through pain-soaked eyes...gasping through his broken mask for relief.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I broke you. How have you come back?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You thought you were the only one who could learn the strength to escape? Bane looks at Batman, curiosity behind his pain.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I never escaped - R 's al Gh l A U rescued me. That is why I must fulfill his plan. That is why I must avenge his murder.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The child of R 's al Gh l made the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (O.S) But he is not the child of R 's al A Gh l... U Batman flinches, frozen as Miranda leans into his ear...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I am. Miranda has a knife through Batman's suit, into his ribs... And though I am not 'ordinary', I am a citizen... She pulls out the trigger...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon spots the second black truck moving down the street. His men pull in front, slowing it. Gordon jumps into the back. The truck accelerates - Gordon drops, hanging on to the bumper, struggling with the box, trying to turn it on...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Batman cannot move to defend himself. He has Bane by the throat, but Miranda has her knife in his side -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: My mother named me Talia before she was killed. The way I would've been killed if not for my protector...Bane.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: the child, Talia, makes eye-contact with the Protector, then leaps. Down below, Prisoners swarm over the protector, ripping the muslin from his face. Bane looks up at Talia, says one quiet word -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Goodbye. Then is overrun.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I climbed out of the pit...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: Young Talia stands by the hole looking out at the landscape... I found my father and brought him back to exact terrible vengeance - but by that time...the prisoners and the doctor had done their work to my friend...my protector... Talia reaches up to touch Bane's mask.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: CUT: the League of Shadows descend into the prison - at their head, R 's al Gh l. They slaughter prisoners. Then A U stop. R 's al Gh l has found Bane, bandaged.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The League took us in. Trained us...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane in a prototype mask, stands on logs, blocking blows from men with sticks.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (V.O.) But my father could not accept Bane. R 's al Gh l watches Bane training. Turns away.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: . LOBBY, CITY HALL - CONTINUOUS Talia looks into Bane's eyes as she holds the knife in Batman's side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He saw only a monster who could never be tamed. Whose very existence was a reminder of the hell he'd left his wife to die in. He excommunicated Bane from the League of Shadows. His only crime was that he loved me. I could not truly forgive my father... Talia looks at Batman, cold. Until you murdered him.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: He was trying to kill millions of innocent people -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: 'Innocent' is a strong word to throw around Gotham, Bruce. I honor my father by finishing his work. Vengeance against the man who killed him is simply a reward for my patience... Talia twists the knife in Batman's side. You see, it's the slow knife...the knife that takes its time, the (MORE)
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: knife that waits years without forgetting, then slips quietly between bones...that's the knife - Talia arms the trigger... - that cuts deepest. She hits the button - nothing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: A light on the metal box is blinking. Gordon hangs on -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talia turns, furious.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your knife may have been too slow... A Mercenary steps forward -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The truck's under attack - Talia looks around, mind racing.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon. (To Batman.) You gave him a way to block my signal. No matter - (Looks at watch.) He's bought Gotham eleven minutes. (Shouts at Mercenary.) Prepare a convoy. We must secure the bomb until it detonates. Talia jumps to her feet. Bane grabs a shotgun from a Mercenary - points it at Batman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Not yet... I want him to feel the heat. (To Batman.) Feel the fire of twelve million souls you failed. Talia reaches up to Bane's mask, reconnects his tubes, tenderly. Goodbye, my friend. Bane nods at her, slowly. Talia moves out with the Mercenaries.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talia gets into a Tumbler with a Mercenary. Three Tumblers pull out in convoy, blowing anything out of the way - cars, cops. Foley stands in the road, firing his sidearm. Talia's Tumbler SMASHES him out of the way.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bane grabs Batman, throws him into the floor - checks the rounds in the barrels.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You'll have to imagine the fire - He shuts the gun - jams it into Batman's face. We both know I need to kill you now. He squeezes the trigger. BLAMMM! Bane is blasted across the lobby by cannon fire. Catwoman is there, on the Bat-Pod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The whole no-guns thing? I don't feel as strongly about it as you do.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake pulls up to the barricade, leads the kids off, marching them up the bridge, Father Reilly at the rear. A Uniform shouts through the loudhailer -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Stay there! What are you doing?!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake, MCU - I'm getting these boys to safety -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Safety?! You're gonna get us all killed. Anyone crosses this bridge they blow the city - 151.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's gonna blow anyway. We need this bridge open right now.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: No one leaves the island. Orders -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Whose orders? Bane's?
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Police Department's.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Haven't you heard the shooting? The Batman's battling it out with Bane -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Batman's dead. Look, Officer -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: It's Detective -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Well, Detective, you take one more step, we have to shoot you. Two more steps, we have to blow the bridge.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: (to the boys) Wait for me back at the bus. The Boys walk back down the bridge...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talia's convoy surrounds the black truck. Tumblers off each flank, protecting the bomb as it counts down...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Batman looks at Catwoman.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: I need you on the ground, me in the air, we have to force that convoy east, to the entrance to the
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Catwoman roars down the steps on the Bat-Pod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon climbs into the back of the truck - the bomb is there, heating up. He looks at the countdown - nine minutes...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake turns back to the Uniform.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Your orders are out of date! The situation's changed! Listen, I'm a cop like you. And I'm walking out there. Please don't shoot me. Blake walks. Shots ring out at his feet. He keeps walking...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Bat descends on the convoy, Catwoman approaches on the ground. A rolling battle ensues. Catwoman targets the rear of the Tumblers, Batman swings the Bat in low at the junctions, trying to force the convoy east... The Tumbler's gun turrets swing around onto Catwoman. She swerves to avoid heavy fire.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake continues to walk, ignoring the warning shots.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Son-of-a-bitch! (To his partner.) Blow it! Before he reaches the line - His partner arms the detonator. Uniform shouts at Blake -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Get down! We're blowing the bridge! As Blake looks, disbelieving, the bridge in front of him blasts upwards in a massive fireball. Blake dives backwards.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Bat blasts away in front of the convoy, making a huge crater in front of a Tumbler and trapping it, rear in the air. Catwoman dodges around it, uses the Bat-Pod cannons to take out another Tumbler... The countdown ticks away...seven minutes.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: As Fox fires up the reactor something catches his eye - something is wrong...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The smoke clears, Blake sees the impossible gap.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: You idiots! You sons of bitches! You're killing us!!
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon climbs out the back of the truck but is immediately strafed by gunfire from the Tumblers. He dives back inside, moves to the front of the trailer - looks at the bulkhead, gauging the driver's position. Starts firing blind through the bulkhead -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Bullets fly through the cab. The driver takes one, falls forward, dead. Talia takes the wheel - bullets keep coming.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Blake races back. Father Reilly has the boys in a huddle,
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Father! Get the boys on the bus -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: But there's nowhere to go, son.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: The Bat spins down in front of the black truck, forcing it into a hard right turn...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Talia watches the navigation screen.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: They're trying to force us onto
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Pushing us to the entrance of the reactor. They're going to try and reconnect the core.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Can they? Talia smiles.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox runs to a ladder. Alarms sound. As he hits the ladder he turns. A massive rumble builds - water SMASHES into the reactor, flooding in from both directions.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Catwoman comes up behind the lead Tumbler. She blasts it again and again - it flips diagonally into the path of the black truck, causing the truck to lurch onto its side. Both vehicles careen into the mouth of the tunnel.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox loops his arm around a rung of the ladder and braces as a wave smashes into him, painfully...
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon jumps out of the truck, opening the rear doors to expose the glowing core. Catwoman pulls up on the Bat-Pod.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Give me a hand! The Bat lands at the tunnel mouth. Gordon moves in to try and grab the core but it is too hot. Let's get a cable on it and drag it out! Come on, we're almost there - Laughter. Gordon turns. Talia, lying half out the truck. Dying.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox showed me how to operate the reactor core. Including the emergency flood -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Fox pulls himself above the rising whitewater -
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: Gordon looks down at Talia. Batman is at his side.
direction.name: direction

direction.raw_text: There is no way to stop this bomb. Prepare yourselves... (Looks up at Batman.) My father's work is done. Talia smiles as her eyes flutter closed. Gordon turns - Batman is at the core, plunging his hands into the heat to attach a hoist from the Bat.
direction.name: direction

The canopy closes - and as the Bat fires up Gordon remembers -

direction.raw_text: No. That's Batman! Blake turns to see the Bat thundering out of the heart of Gotham, trailing smoke, the core hanging from it. It curves dangerously close to the bridge before heading for the mouth of the river...the bay...the ocean... Until a point of light fires into an enormous nuclear BLAST - wind and light and dust blowing VIOLENTLY but harmlessly over the bridge, the tunnel mouth, all of Gotham... As the nuclear dawn fades over Gotham, and we see its inhabitants start to raise their heads, and helicopters and boats converge on the island, we hear a voice. Jim Gordon.

Gordon closes the book, looking down at Bruce Wayne's grave. 'It is a far, far better rest that I go to than I have ever known.' Gordon looks up at the figure standing across from him... Alfred. Tears streaming. Fox places a gentle hand on Alfred's shoulder, then leaves. Gordon and Blake follow. Alfred, alone with the Wayne family, turns to the grave beside Bruce's - the grave of Thomas and Martha Wayne.
